72/*
73===========
74GetGameAPI
75============
76*/
77#if __MWERKS__
78#pragma export on
79#endif
80#if __GNUC__ >= 4
81#pragma GCC visibility push(default)
82#endif
83extern "C" gameExport_t *GetGameAPI( gameImport_t *import ) {
84#if __MWERKS__
85#pragma export off
86#endif
87
88 if ( import->version == GAME_API_VERSION ) {
89
90 // set interface pointers used by the game
91 sys = import->sys;
92 common = import->common;
93 cmdSystem = import->cmdSystem;
94 cvarSystem = import->cvarSystem;
95 fileSystem = import->fileSystem;
96 networkSystem = import->networkSystem;
97 renderSystem = import->renderSystem;
98 soundSystem = import->soundSystem;
99 renderModelManager = import->renderModelManager;
100 uiManager = import->uiManager;
101 declManager = import->declManager;
102 AASFileManager = import->AASFileManager;
103 collisionModelManager = import->collisionModelManager;
104 }
105
106 // set interface pointers used by idLib
107 idLib::sys = sys;
108 idLib::common = common;
109 idLib::cvarSystem = cvarSystem;
110 idLib::fileSystem = fileSystem;
111
112 // setup export interface
113 gameExport.version = GAME_API_VERSION;
114 gameExport.game = game;
115 gameExport.gameEdit = gameEdit;
116
117 return &gameExport;
118}
119#if __GNUC__ >= 4
120#pragma GCC visibility pop
121#endif
122
123/*
124===========
125TestGameAPI
126============
127*/
128void TestGameAPI( void ) {
129 gameImport_t testImport;
130 gameExport_t testExport;
131
132 testImport.sys = ::sys;
133 testImport.common = ::common;
134 testImport.cmdSystem = ::cmdSystem;
135 testImport.cvarSystem = ::cvarSystem;
136 testImport.fileSystem = ::fileSystem;
137 testImport.networkSystem = ::networkSystem;
138 testImport.renderSystem = ::renderSystem;
139 testImport.soundSystem = ::soundSystem;
140 testImport.renderModelManager = ::renderModelManager;
141 testImport.uiManager = ::uiManager;
142 testImport.declManager = ::declManager;
143 testImport.AASFileManager = ::AASFileManager;
144 testImport.collisionModelManager = ::collisionModelManager;
145
146 testExport = *GetGameAPI( &testImport );
147}

158/*
159===========
160idGameLocal::Clear
161============
162*/
163void idGameLocal::Clear( void ) {
164 int i;
165
166 serverInfo.Clear();
167 numClients = 0;
168 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_CLIENTS; i++ ) {
169 userInfo[i].Clear();
170 persistentPlayerInfo[i].Clear();
171 }
172 memset( usercmds, 0, sizeof( usercmds ) );
173 memset( entities, 0, sizeof( entities ) );
174 memset( spawnIds, -1, sizeof( spawnIds ) );
175 firstFreeIndex = 0;
176 num_entities = 0;
177 spawnedEntities.Clear();
178 activeEntities.Clear();
179 numEntitiesToDeactivate = 0;
180 sortPushers = false;
181 sortTeamMasters = false;
182 persistentLevelInfo.Clear();
183 memset( globalShaderParms, 0, sizeof( globalShaderParms ) );
184 random.SetSeed( 0 );
185 world = NULL;
186 frameCommandThread = NULL;
187 testmodel = NULL;
188 testFx = NULL;
189 clip.Shutdown();
190 pvs.Shutdown();
191 sessionCommand.Clear();
192 locationEntities = NULL;
193 smokeParticles = NULL;
194 editEntities = NULL;
195 entityHash.Clear( 1024, MAX_GENTITIES );
196 inCinematic = false;
197 cinematicSkipTime = 0;
198 cinematicStopTime = 0;
199 cinematicMaxSkipTime = 0;
200 framenum = 0;
201 previousTime = 0;
202 time = 0;
203 vacuumAreaNum = 0;
204 mapFileName.Clear();
205 mapFile = NULL;
206 spawnCount = INITIAL_SPAWN_COUNT;
207 mapSpawnCount = 0;
208 camera = NULL;
209 aasList.Clear();
210 aasNames.Clear();
211 lastAIAlertEntity = NULL;
212 lastAIAlertTime = 0;
213 spawnArgs.Clear();
214 gravity.Set( 0, 0, -1 );
215 playerPVS.h = (unsigned int)-1;
216 playerConnectedAreas.h = (unsigned int)-1;
217 gamestate = GAMESTATE_UNINITIALIZED;
218 skipCinematic = false;
219 influenceActive = false;
220
221 localClientNum = 0;
222 isMultiplayer = false;
223 isServer = false;
224 isClient = false;
225 realClientTime = 0;
226 isNewFrame = true;
227 clientSmoothing = 0.1f;
228 entityDefBits = 0;
229
230 nextGibTime = 0;
231 globalMaterial = NULL;
232 newInfo.Clear();
233 lastGUIEnt = NULL;
234 lastGUI = 0;
235
236 memset( clientEntityStates, 0, sizeof( clientEntityStates ) );
237 memset( clientPVS, 0, sizeof( clientPVS ) );
238 memset( clientSnapshots, 0, sizeof( clientSnapshots ) );
239
240 eventQueue.Init();
241 savedEventQueue.Init();
242
243 memset( lagometer, 0, sizeof( lagometer ) );
244}
245
246/*
247===========
248idGameLocal::Init
249
250 initialize the game object, only happens once at startup, not each level load
251============
252*/
253void idGameLocal::Init( void ) {
254 const idDict *dict;
255 idAAS *aas;
256
257#ifndef GAME_DLL
258
259 TestGameAPI();
260
261#else
262
263 // initialize idLib
264 idLib::Init();
265
266 // register static cvars declared in the game
267 idCVar::RegisterStaticVars();
268
269 // initialize processor specific SIMD
270 idSIMD::InitProcessor( "game", com_forceGenericSIMD.GetBool() );
271
272#endif
273
274 Printf( "--------- Initializing Game ----------\n" );
275 Printf( "gamename: %s\n", GAME_VERSION );
276 Printf( "gamedate: %s\n", __DATE__ );
277
278 // register game specific decl types
279 declManager->RegisterDeclType( "model", DECL_MODELDEF, idDeclAllocator<idDeclModelDef> );
280 declManager->RegisterDeclType( "export", DECL_MODELEXPORT, idDeclAllocator<idDecl> );
281
282 // register game specific decl folders
283 declManager->RegisterDeclFolder( "def", ".def", DECL_ENTITYDEF );
284 declManager->RegisterDeclFolder( "fx", ".fx", DECL_FX );
285 declManager->RegisterDeclFolder( "particles", ".prt", DECL_PARTICLE );
286 declManager->RegisterDeclFolder( "af", ".af", DECL_AF );
287 declManager->RegisterDeclFolder( "newpdas", ".pda", DECL_PDA );
288
289 cmdSystem->AddCommand( "listModelDefs", idListDecls_f<DECL_MODELDEF>, CMD_FL_SYSTEM|CMD_FL_GAME, "lists model defs" );
290 cmdSystem->AddCommand( "printModelDefs", idPrintDecls_f<DECL_MODELDEF>, CMD_FL_SYSTEM|CMD_FL_GAME, "prints a model def", idCmdSystem::ArgCompletion_Decl<DECL_MODELDEF> );
291
292 Clear();
293
294 idEvent::Init();
295 idClass::Init();
296
297 InitConsoleCommands();
298
299 // load default scripts
300 program.Startup( SCRIPT_DEFAULT );
301
302 smokeParticles = new idSmokeParticles;
303
304 // set up the aas
305 dict = FindEntityDefDict( "aas_types" );
306 if ( !dict ) {
307 Error( "Unable to find entityDef for 'aas_types'" );
308 }
309
310 // allocate space for the aas
311 const idKeyValue *kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "type" );
312 while( kv != NULL ) {
313 aas = idAAS::Alloc();
314 aasList.Append( aas );
315 aasNames.Append( kv->GetValue() );
316 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "type", kv );
317 }
318
319 gamestate = GAMESTATE_NOMAP;
320
321 Printf( "...%d aas types\n", aasList.Num() );
322 Printf( "game initialized.\n" );
323 Printf( "--------------------------------------\n" );
324}
325
326/*
327===========
328idGameLocal::Shutdown
329
330 shut down the entire game
331============
332*/
333void idGameLocal::Shutdown( void ) {
334
335 if ( !common ) {
336 return;
337 }
338
339 Printf( "------------ Game Shutdown -----------\n" );
340
341 mpGame.Shutdown();
342
343 MapShutdown();
344
345 aasList.DeleteContents( true );
346 aasNames.Clear();
347
348 idAI::FreeObstacleAvoidanceNodes();
349
350 // shutdown the model exporter
351 idModelExport::Shutdown();
352
353 idEvent::Shutdown();
354
355 delete[] locationEntities;
356 locationEntities = NULL;
357
358 delete smokeParticles;
359 smokeParticles = NULL;
360
361 idClass::Shutdown();
362
363 // clear list with forces
364 idForce::ClearForceList();
365
366 // free the program data
367 program.FreeData();
368
369 // delete the .map file
370 delete mapFile;
371 mapFile = NULL;
372
373 // free the collision map
374 collisionModelManager->FreeMap();
375
376 ShutdownConsoleCommands();
377
378 // free memory allocated by class objects
379 Clear();
380
381 // shut down the animation manager
382 animationLib.Shutdown();
383
384 Printf( "--------------------------------------\n" );
385
386#ifdef GAME_DLL
387
388 // remove auto-completion function pointers pointing into this DLL
389 cvarSystem->RemoveFlaggedAutoCompletion( CVAR_GAME );
390
391 // enable leak test
392 Mem_EnableLeakTest( "game" );
393
394 // shutdown idLib
395 idLib::ShutDown();
396
397#endif
398}
399
400/*
401===========
402idGameLocal::SaveGame
403
404save the current player state, level name, and level state
405the session may have written some data to the file already
406============
407*/
408void idGameLocal::SaveGame( idFile *f ) {
409 int i;
410 idEntity *ent;
411 idEntity *link;
412
413 idSaveGame savegame( f );
414
415 if (g_flushSave.GetBool( ) == true ) {
416 // force flushing with each write... for tracking down
417 // save game bugs.
418 f->ForceFlush();
419 }
420
421 savegame.WriteBuildNumber( BUILD_NUMBER );
422
423 // go through all entities and threads and add them to the object list
424 for( i = 0; i < MAX_GENTITIES; i++ ) {
425 ent = entities[i];
426
427 if ( ent ) {
428 if ( ent->GetTeamMaster() && ent->GetTeamMaster() != ent ) {
429 continue;
430 }
431 for ( link = ent; link != NULL; link = link->GetNextTeamEntity() ) {
432 savegame.AddObject( link );
433 }
434 }
435 }
436
437 idList<idThread *> threads;
438 threads = idThread::GetThreads();
439
440 for( i = 0; i < threads.Num(); i++ ) {
441 savegame.AddObject( threads[i] );
442 }
443
444 // write out complete object list
445 savegame.WriteObjectList();
446
447 program.Save( &savegame );
448
449 savegame.WriteInt( g_skill.GetInteger() );
450
451 savegame.WriteDict( &serverInfo );
452
453 savegame.WriteInt( numClients );
454 for( i = 0; i < numClients; i++ ) {
455 savegame.WriteDict( &userInfo[ i ] );
456 savegame.WriteUsercmd( usercmds[ i ] );
457 savegame.WriteDict( &persistentPlayerInfo[ i ] );
458 }
459
460 for( i = 0; i < MAX_GENTITIES; i++ ) {
461 savegame.WriteObject( entities[ i ] );
462 savegame.WriteInt( spawnIds[ i ] );
463 }
464
465 savegame.WriteInt( firstFreeIndex );
466 savegame.WriteInt( num_entities );
467
468 // enityHash is restored by idEntity::Restore setting the entity name.
469
470 savegame.WriteObject( world );
471
472 savegame.WriteInt( spawnedEntities.Num() );
473 for( ent = spawnedEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
474 savegame.WriteObject( ent );
475 }
476
477 savegame.WriteInt( activeEntities.Num() );
478 for( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->activeNode.Next() ) {
479 savegame.WriteObject( ent );
480 }
481
482 savegame.WriteInt( numEntitiesToDeactivate );
483 savegame.WriteBool( sortPushers );
484 savegame.WriteBool( sortTeamMasters );
485 savegame.WriteDict( &persistentLevelInfo );
486
487 for( i = 0; i < MAX_GLOBAL_SHADER_PARMS; i++ ) {
488 savegame.WriteFloat( globalShaderParms[ i ] );
489 }
490
491 savegame.WriteInt( random.GetSeed() );
492 savegame.WriteObject( frameCommandThread );
493
494 // clip
495 // push
496 // pvs
497
498 testmodel = NULL;
499 testFx = NULL;
500
501 savegame.WriteString( sessionCommand );
502
503 // FIXME: save smoke particles
504
505 savegame.WriteInt( cinematicSkipTime );
506 savegame.WriteInt( cinematicStopTime );
507 savegame.WriteInt( cinematicMaxSkipTime );
508 savegame.WriteBool( inCinematic );
509 savegame.WriteBool( skipCinematic );
510
511 savegame.WriteBool( isMultiplayer );
512 savegame.WriteInt( gameType );
513
514 savegame.WriteInt( framenum );
515 savegame.WriteInt( previousTime );
516 savegame.WriteInt( time );
517
518 savegame.WriteInt( vacuumAreaNum );
519
520 savegame.WriteInt( entityDefBits );
521 savegame.WriteBool( isServer );
522 savegame.WriteBool( isClient );
523
524 savegame.WriteInt( localClientNum );
525
526 // snapshotEntities is used for multiplayer only
527
528 savegame.WriteInt( realClientTime );
529 savegame.WriteBool( isNewFrame );
530 savegame.WriteFloat( clientSmoothing );
531
532 savegame.WriteBool( mapCycleLoaded );
533 savegame.WriteInt( spawnCount );
534
535 if ( !locationEntities ) {
536 savegame.WriteInt( 0 );
537 } else {
538 savegame.WriteInt( gameRenderWorld->NumAreas() );
539 for( i = 0; i < gameRenderWorld->NumAreas(); i++ ) {
540 savegame.WriteObject( locationEntities[ i ] );
541 }
542 }
543
544 savegame.WriteObject( camera );
545
546 savegame.WriteMaterial( globalMaterial );
547
548 lastAIAlertEntity.Save( &savegame );
549 savegame.WriteInt( lastAIAlertTime );
550
551 savegame.WriteDict( &spawnArgs );
552
553 savegame.WriteInt( playerPVS.i );
554 savegame.WriteInt( playerPVS.h );
555 savegame.WriteInt( playerConnectedAreas.i );
556 savegame.WriteInt( playerConnectedAreas.h );
557
558 savegame.WriteVec3( gravity );
559
560 // gamestate
561
562 savegame.WriteBool( influenceActive );
563 savegame.WriteInt( nextGibTime );
564
565 // spawnSpots
566 // initialSpots
567 // currentInitialSpot
568 // newInfo
569 // makingBuild
570 // shakeSounds
571
572 // write out pending events
573 idEvent::Save( &savegame );
574
575 savegame.Close();
576}

578/*
579===========
580idGameLocal::GetPersistentPlayerInfo
581============
582*/
583const idDict &idGameLocal::GetPersistentPlayerInfo( int clientNum ) {
584 idEntity *ent;
585
586 persistentPlayerInfo[ clientNum ].Clear();
587 ent = entities[ clientNum ];
588 if ( ent && ent->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
589 static_cast<idPlayer *>(ent)->SavePersistantInfo();
590 }
591
592 return persistentPlayerInfo[ clientNum ];
593}

596===========
597idGameLocal::SetPersistentPlayerInfo
598============
599*/
600void idGameLocal::SetPersistentPlayerInfo( int clientNum, const idDict &playerInfo ) {
601 persistentPlayerInfo[ clientNum ] = playerInfo;
602}

608*/
609void idGameLocal::Printf( const char *fmt, ... ) const {
610 va_list argptr;
611 char text[MAX_STRING_CHARS];
612
613 va_start( argptr, fmt );
614 idStr::vsnPrintf( text, sizeof( text ), fmt, argptr );
615 va_end( argptr );
616
617 common->Printf( "%s", text );
618}

621============

623============
624*/
625void idGameLocal::DPrintf( const char *fmt, ... ) const {

627 char text[MAX_STRING_CHARS];
628
629 if ( !developer.GetBool() ) {
630 return;
631 }
632
633 va_start( argptr, fmt );
634 idStr::vsnPrintf( text, sizeof( text ), fmt, argptr );
635 va_end( argptr );
636
637 common->Printf( "%s", text );
638}

640/*
641============
642idGameLocal::Warning
643============
644*/
645void idGameLocal::Warning( const char *fmt, ... ) const {
646 va_list argptr;
647 char text[MAX_STRING_CHARS];
648 idThread * thread;
649
650 va_start( argptr, fmt );
651 idStr::vsnPrintf( text, sizeof( text ), fmt, argptr );
652 va_end( argptr );
653
654 thread = idThread::CurrentThread();
655 if ( thread ) {
656 thread->Warning( "%s", text );
657 } else {
658 common->Warning( "%s", text );
659 }
660}

734
735/*
736===========
737idGameLocal::SetUserInfo
738============
739*/
740const idDict* idGameLocal::SetUserInfo( int clientNum, const idDict &userInfo, bool isClient, bool canModify ) {
741 int i;
742 bool modifiedInfo = false;
743
744 this->isClient = isClient;
745
746 if ( clientNum >= 0 && clientNum < MAX_CLIENTS ) {
747 idGameLocal::userInfo[ clientNum ] = userInfo;
748
749 // server sanity
750 if ( canModify ) {
751
752 // don't let numeric nicknames, it can be exploited to go around kick and ban commands from the server
753 if ( idStr::IsNumeric( this->userInfo[ clientNum ].GetString( "ui_name" ) ) ) {
754 idGameLocal::userInfo[ clientNum ].Set( "ui_name", va( "%s_", idGameLocal::userInfo[ clientNum ].GetString( "ui_name" ) ) );
755 modifiedInfo = true;
756 }
757
758 // don't allow dupe nicknames
759 for ( i = 0; i < numClients; i++ ) {
760 if ( i == clientNum ) {
761 continue;
762 }
763 if ( entities[ i ] && entities[ i ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
764 if ( !idStr::Icmp( idGameLocal::userInfo[ clientNum ].GetString( "ui_name" ), idGameLocal::userInfo[ i ].GetString( "ui_name" ) ) ) {
765 idGameLocal::userInfo[ clientNum ].Set( "ui_name", va( "%s_", idGameLocal::userInfo[ clientNum ].GetString( "ui_name" ) ) );
766 modifiedInfo = true;
767 i = -1; // rescan
768 continue;
769 }
770 }
771 }
772 }
773
774 if ( entities[ clientNum ] && entities[ clientNum ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
775 modifiedInfo |= static_cast<idPlayer *>( entities[ clientNum ] )->UserInfoChanged( canModify );
776 }
777
778 if ( !isClient ) {
779 // now mark this client in game
780 mpGame.EnterGame( clientNum );
781 }
782 }
783
784 if ( modifiedInfo ) {
785 assert( canModify );
786 newInfo = idGameLocal::userInfo[ clientNum ];
787 return &newInfo;
788 }
789 return NULL;
790}
791
792/*
793===========
794idGameLocal::GetUserInfo
795============
796*/
797const idDict* idGameLocal::GetUserInfo( int clientNum ) {
798 if ( entities[ clientNum ] && entities[ clientNum ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
799 return &userInfo[ clientNum ];
800 }
801 return NULL;
802}
803
804/*
805===========
806idGameLocal::SetServerInfo
807============
808*/
809void idGameLocal::SetServerInfo( const idDict &_serverInfo ) {
810 idBitMsg outMsg;
811 byte msgBuf[MAX_GAME_MESSAGE_SIZE];
812
813 serverInfo = _serverInfo;
814 UpdateServerInfoFlags();
815
816 if ( !isClient ) {
817 // Let our clients know the server info changed
818 outMsg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
819 outMsg.WriteByte( GAME_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_SERVERINFO );
820 outMsg.WriteDeltaDict( gameLocal.serverInfo, NULL );
821 networkSystem->ServerSendReliableMessage( -1, outMsg );
822 }
823}
824
825
826/*
827===================
828idGameLocal::LoadMap
829
830Initializes all map variables common to both save games and spawned games.
831===================
832*/
833void idGameLocal::LoadMap( const char *mapName, int randseed ) {
834 int i;
835 bool sameMap = (mapFile && idStr::Icmp(mapFileName, mapName) == 0);
836
837 // clear the sound system
838 gameSoundWorld->ClearAllSoundEmitters();
839
840 InitAsyncNetwork();
841
842 if ( !sameMap || ( mapFile && mapFile->NeedsReload() ) ) {
843 // load the .map file
844 if ( mapFile ) {
845 delete mapFile;
846 }
847 mapFile = new idMapFile;
848 if ( !mapFile->Parse( idStr( mapName ) + ".map" ) ) {
849 delete mapFile;
850 mapFile = NULL;
851 Error( "Couldn't load %s", mapName );
852 }
853 }
854 mapFileName = mapFile->GetName();
855
856 // load the collision map
857 collisionModelManager->LoadMap( mapFile );
858
859 numClients = 0;
860
861 // initialize all entities for this game
862 memset( entities, 0, sizeof( entities ) );
863 memset( usercmds, 0, sizeof( usercmds ) );
864 memset( spawnIds, -1, sizeof( spawnIds ) );
865 spawnCount = INITIAL_SPAWN_COUNT;
866
867 spawnedEntities.Clear();
868 activeEntities.Clear();
869 numEntitiesToDeactivate = 0;
870 sortTeamMasters = false;
871 sortPushers = false;
872 lastGUIEnt = NULL;
873 lastGUI = 0;
874
875 globalMaterial = NULL;
876
877 memset( globalShaderParms, 0, sizeof( globalShaderParms ) );
878
879 // always leave room for the max number of clients,
880 // even if they aren't all used, so numbers inside that
881 // range are NEVER anything but clients
882 num_entities = MAX_CLIENTS;
883 firstFreeIndex = MAX_CLIENTS;
884
885 // reset the random number generator.
886 random.SetSeed( isMultiplayer ? randseed : 0 );
887
888 camera = NULL;
889 world = NULL;
890 testmodel = NULL;
891 testFx = NULL;
892
893 lastAIAlertEntity = NULL;
894 lastAIAlertTime = 0;
895
896 previousTime = 0;
897 time = 0;
898 framenum = 0;
899 sessionCommand = "";
900 nextGibTime = 0;
901
902 vacuumAreaNum = -1; // if an info_vacuum is spawned, it will set this
903
904 if ( !editEntities ) {
905 editEntities = new idEditEntities;
906 }
907
908 gravity.Set( 0, 0, -g_gravity.GetFloat() );
909
910 spawnArgs.Clear();
911
912 skipCinematic = false;
913 inCinematic = false;
914 cinematicSkipTime = 0;
915 cinematicStopTime = 0;
916 cinematicMaxSkipTime = 0;
917
918 clip.Init();
919 pvs.Init();
920 playerPVS.i = -1;
921 playerConnectedAreas.i = -1;
922
923 // load navigation system for all the different monster sizes
924 for( i = 0; i < aasNames.Num(); i++ ) {
925 aasList[ i ]->Init( idStr( mapFileName ).SetFileExtension( aasNames[ i ] ).c_str(), mapFile->GetGeometryCRC() );
926 }
927
928 // clear the smoke particle free list
929 smokeParticles->Init();
930
931 // cache miscellanious media references
932 FindEntityDef( "preCacheExtras", false );
933
934 if ( !sameMap ) {
935 mapFile->RemovePrimitiveData();
936 }
937}
938
939/*
940===================
941idGameLocal::LocalMapRestart
942===================
943*/
944void idGameLocal::LocalMapRestart( ) {
945 int i, latchSpawnCount;
946
947 Printf( "----------- Game Map Restart ------------\n" );
948
949 gamestate = GAMESTATE_SHUTDOWN;
950
951 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_CLIENTS; i++ ) {
952 if ( entities[ i ] && entities[ i ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
953 static_cast< idPlayer * >( entities[ i ] )->PrepareForRestart();
954 }
955 }
956
957 eventQueue.Shutdown();
958 savedEventQueue.Shutdown();
959
960 MapClear( false );
961
962 // clear the smoke particle free list
963 smokeParticles->Init();
964
965 // clear the sound system
966 if ( gameSoundWorld ) {
967 gameSoundWorld->ClearAllSoundEmitters();
968 }
969
970 // the spawnCount is reset to zero temporarily to spawn the map entities with the same spawnId
971 // if we don't do that, network clients are confused and don't show any map entities
972 latchSpawnCount = spawnCount;
973 spawnCount = INITIAL_SPAWN_COUNT;
974
975 gamestate = GAMESTATE_STARTUP;
976
977 program.Restart();
978
979 InitScriptForMap();
980
981 MapPopulate();
982
983 // once the map is populated, set the spawnCount back to where it was so we don't risk any collision
984 // (note that if there are no players in the game, we could just leave it at it's current value)
985 spawnCount = latchSpawnCount;
986
987 // setup the client entities again
988 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_CLIENTS; i++ ) {
989 if ( entities[ i ] && entities[ i ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
990 static_cast< idPlayer * >( entities[ i ] )->Restart();
991 }
992 }
993
994 gamestate = GAMESTATE_ACTIVE;
995
996 Printf( "--------------------------------------\n" );
997}
998
999/*
1000===================
1001idGameLocal::MapRestart
1002===================
1003*/
1004void idGameLocal::MapRestart( ) {
1005 idBitMsg outMsg;
1006 byte msgBuf[MAX_GAME_MESSAGE_SIZE];
1007 idDict newInfo;
1008 int i;
1009 const idKeyValue *keyval, *keyval2;
1010
1011 if ( isClient ) {
1012 LocalMapRestart();
1013 } else {
1014 newInfo = *cvarSystem->MoveCVarsToDict( CVAR_SERVERINFO );
1015 for ( i = 0; i < newInfo.GetNumKeyVals(); i++ ) {
1016 keyval = newInfo.GetKeyVal( i );
1017 keyval2 = serverInfo.FindKey( keyval->GetKey() );
1018 if ( !keyval2 ) {
1019 break;
1020 }
1021 // a select set of si_ changes will cause a full restart of the server
1022 if ( keyval->GetValue().Cmp( keyval2->GetValue() ) &&
1023 ( !keyval->GetKey().Cmp( "si_pure" ) || !keyval->GetKey().Cmp( "si_map" ) ) ) {
1024 break;
1025 }
1026 }
1027 cmdSystem->BufferCommandText( CMD_EXEC_NOW, "rescanSI" );
1028 if ( i != newInfo.GetNumKeyVals() ) {
1029 cmdSystem->BufferCommandText( CMD_EXEC_APPEND, "nextMap" );
1030 } else {
1031 outMsg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
1032 outMsg.WriteByte( GAME_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_RESTART );
1033 outMsg.WriteBits( 1, 1 );
1034 outMsg.WriteDeltaDict( serverInfo, NULL );
1035 networkSystem->ServerSendReliableMessage( -1, outMsg );
1036
1037 LocalMapRestart();
1038 mpGame.MapRestart();
1039 }
1040 }
1041}
1042
1043/*
1044===================
1045idGameLocal::MapRestart_f
1046===================
1047*/
1048void idGameLocal::MapRestart_f( const idCmdArgs &args ) {
1049 if ( !gameLocal.isMultiplayer || gameLocal.isClient ) {
1050 common->Printf( "server is not running - use spawnServer\n" );
1051 cmdSystem->BufferCommandText( CMD_EXEC_APPEND, "spawnServer\n" );
1052 return;
1053 }
1054
1055 gameLocal.MapRestart( );
1056}
1057
1058/*
1059===================
1060idGameLocal::NextMap
1061===================
1062*/
1063bool idGameLocal::NextMap( void ) {
1064 const function_t *func;
1065 idThread *thread;
1066 idDict newInfo;
1067 const idKeyValue *keyval, *keyval2;
1068 int i;
1069
1070 if ( !g_mapCycle.GetString()[0] ) {
1071 Printf( common->GetLanguageDict()->GetString( "#str_04294" ) );
1072 return false;
1073 }
1074 if ( fileSystem->ReadFile( g_mapCycle.GetString(), NULL, NULL ) < 0 ) {
1075 if ( fileSystem->ReadFile( va( "%s.scriptcfg", g_mapCycle.GetString() ), NULL, NULL ) < 0 ) {
1076 Printf( "map cycle script '%s': not found\n", g_mapCycle.GetString() );
1077 return false;
1078 } else {
1079 g_mapCycle.SetString( va( "%s.scriptcfg", g_mapCycle.GetString() ) );
1080 }
1081 }
1082
1083 Printf( "map cycle script: '%s'\n", g_mapCycle.GetString() );
1084 func = program.FindFunction( "mapcycle::cycle" );
1085 if ( !func ) {
1086 program.CompileFile( g_mapCycle.GetString() );
1087 func = program.FindFunction( "mapcycle::cycle" );
1088 }
1089 if ( !func ) {
1090 Printf( "Couldn't find mapcycle::cycle\n" );
1091 return false;
1092 }
1093 thread = new idThread( func );
1094 thread->Start();
1095 delete thread;
1096
1097 newInfo = *cvarSystem->MoveCVarsToDict( CVAR_SERVERINFO );
1098 for ( i = 0; i < newInfo.GetNumKeyVals(); i++ ) {
1099 keyval = newInfo.GetKeyVal( i );
1100 keyval2 = serverInfo.FindKey( keyval->GetKey() );
1101 if ( !keyval2 || keyval->GetValue().Cmp( keyval2->GetValue() ) ) {
1102 break;
1103 }
1104 }
1105 return ( i != newInfo.GetNumKeyVals() );
1106}
1107
1108/*
1109===================
1110idGameLocal::NextMap_f
1111===================
1112*/
1113void idGameLocal::NextMap_f( const idCmdArgs &args ) {
1114 if ( !gameLocal.isMultiplayer || gameLocal.isClient ) {
1115 common->Printf( "server is not running\n" );
1116 return;
1117 }
1118
1119 gameLocal.NextMap( );
1120 // next map was either voted for or triggered by a server command - always restart
1121 gameLocal.MapRestart( );
1122}
1123
1124/*
1125===================
1126idGameLocal::MapPopulate
1127===================
1128*/
1129void idGameLocal::MapPopulate( void ) {
1130
1131 if ( isMultiplayer ) {
1132 cvarSystem->SetCVarBool( "r_skipSpecular", false );
1133 }
1134 // parse the key/value pairs and spawn entities
1135 SpawnMapEntities();
1136
1137 // mark location entities in all connected areas
1138 SpreadLocations();
1139
1140 // prepare the list of randomized initial spawn spots
1141 RandomizeInitialSpawns();
1142
1143 // spawnCount - 1 is the number of entities spawned into the map, their indexes started at MAX_CLIENTS (included)
1144 // mapSpawnCount is used as the max index of map entities, it's the first index of non-map entities
1145 mapSpawnCount = MAX_CLIENTS + spawnCount - 1;
1146
1147 // execute pending events before the very first game frame
1148 // this makes sure the map script main() function is called
1149 // before the physics are run so entities can bind correctly
1150 Printf( "==== Processing events ====\n" );
1151 idEvent::ServiceEvents();
1152}

1154/*
1155===================
1156idGameLocal::InitFromNewMap
1157===================
1158*/
1159void idGameLocal::InitFromNewMap( const char *mapName, idRenderWorld *renderWorld, idSoundWorld *soundWorld, bool isServer, bool isClient, int randseed ) {
1160
1161 this->isServer = isServer;
1162 this->isClient = isClient;
1163 this->isMultiplayer = isServer || isClient;
1164
1165 if ( mapFileName.Length() ) {
1166 MapShutdown();
1167 }
1168
1169 Printf( "----------- Game Map Init ------------\n" );
1170
1171 gamestate = GAMESTATE_STARTUP;
1172
1173 gameRenderWorld = renderWorld;
1174 gameSoundWorld = soundWorld;
1175
1176 LoadMap( mapName, randseed );
1177
1178 InitScriptForMap();
1179
1180 MapPopulate();
1181
1182 mpGame.Reset();
1183
1184 mpGame.Precache();
1185
1186 // free up any unused animations
1187 animationLib.FlushUnusedAnims();
1188
1189 gamestate = GAMESTATE_ACTIVE;
1190
1191 Printf( "--------------------------------------\n" );
1192}
1193
1194/*
1195=================
1196idGameLocal::InitFromSaveGame
1197=================
1198*/
1199bool idGameLocal::InitFromSaveGame( const char *mapName, idRenderWorld *renderWorld, idSoundWorld *soundWorld, idFile *saveGameFile ) {
1200 int i;
1201 int num;
1202 idEntity *ent;
1203 idDict si;
1204
1205 if ( mapFileName.Length() ) {
1206 MapShutdown();
1207 }
1208
1209 Printf( "------- Game Map Init SaveGame -------\n" );
1210
1211 gamestate = GAMESTATE_STARTUP;
1212
1213 gameRenderWorld = renderWorld;
1214 gameSoundWorld = soundWorld;
1215
1216 idRestoreGame savegame( saveGameFile );
1217
1218 savegame.ReadBuildNumber();
1219
1220 // Create the list of all objects in the game
1221 savegame.CreateObjects();
1222
1223 // Load the idProgram, also checking to make sure scripting hasn't changed since the savegame
1224 if ( program.Restore( &savegame ) == false ) {
1225
1226 // Abort the load process, and let the session know so that it can restart the level
1227 // with the player persistent data.
1228 savegame.DeleteObjects();
1229 program.Restart();
1230
1231 return false;
1232 }
1233
1234 // load the map needed for this savegame
1235 LoadMap( mapName, 0 );
1236
1237 savegame.ReadInt( i );
1238 g_skill.SetInteger( i );
1239
1240 // precache the player
1241 FindEntityDef( "player_doommarine", false );
1242
1243 // precache any media specified in the map
1244 for ( i = 0; i < mapFile->GetNumEntities(); i++ ) {
1245 idMapEntity *mapEnt = mapFile->GetEntity( i );
1246
1247 if ( !InhibitEntitySpawn( mapEnt->epairs ) ) {
1248 CacheDictionaryMedia( &mapEnt->epairs );
1249 const char *classname = mapEnt->epairs.GetString( "classname" );
1250 if ( classname != '\0' ) {
1251 FindEntityDef( classname, false );
1252 }
1253 }
1254 }
1255
1256 savegame.ReadDict( &si );
1257 SetServerInfo( si );
1258
1259 savegame.ReadInt( numClients );
1260 for( i = 0; i < numClients; i++ ) {
1261 savegame.ReadDict( &userInfo[ i ] );
1262 savegame.ReadUsercmd( usercmds[ i ] );
1263 savegame.ReadDict( &persistentPlayerInfo[ i ] );
1264 }
1265
1266 for( i = 0; i < MAX_GENTITIES; i++ ) {
1267 savegame.ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( entities[ i ] ) );
1268 savegame.ReadInt( spawnIds[ i ] );
1269
1270 // restore the entityNumber
1271 if ( entities[ i ] != NULL ) {
1272 entities[ i ]->entityNumber = i;
1273 }
1274 }
1275
1276 savegame.ReadInt( firstFreeIndex );
1277 savegame.ReadInt( num_entities );
1278
1279 // enityHash is restored by idEntity::Restore setting the entity name.
1280
1281 savegame.ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( world ) );
1282
1283 savegame.ReadInt( num );
1284 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
1285 savegame.ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( ent ) );
1286 assert( ent );
1287 if ( ent ) {
1288 ent->spawnNode.AddToEnd( spawnedEntities );
1289 }
1290 }
1291
1292 savegame.ReadInt( num );
1293 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
1294 savegame.ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( ent ) );
1295 assert( ent );
1296 if ( ent ) {
1297 ent->activeNode.AddToEnd( activeEntities );
1298 }
1299 }
1300
1301 savegame.ReadInt( numEntitiesToDeactivate );
1302 savegame.ReadBool( sortPushers );
1303 savegame.ReadBool( sortTeamMasters );
1304 savegame.ReadDict( &persistentLevelInfo );
1305
1306 for( i = 0; i < MAX_GLOBAL_SHADER_PARMS; i++ ) {
1307 savegame.ReadFloat( globalShaderParms[ i ] );
1308 }
1309
1310 savegame.ReadInt( i );
1311 random.SetSeed( i );
1312
1313 savegame.ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( frameCommandThread ) );
1314
1315 // clip
1316 // push
1317 // pvs
1318
1319 // testmodel = "<NULL>"
1320 // testFx = "<NULL>"
1321
1322 savegame.ReadString( sessionCommand );
1323
1324 // FIXME: save smoke particles
1325
1326 savegame.ReadInt( cinematicSkipTime );
1327 savegame.ReadInt( cinematicStopTime );
1328 savegame.ReadInt( cinematicMaxSkipTime );
1329 savegame.ReadBool( inCinematic );
1330 savegame.ReadBool( skipCinematic );
1331
1332 savegame.ReadBool( isMultiplayer );
1333 savegame.ReadInt( (int &)gameType );
1334
1335 savegame.ReadInt( framenum );
1336 savegame.ReadInt( previousTime );
1337 savegame.ReadInt( time );
1338
1339 savegame.ReadInt( vacuumAreaNum );
1340
1341 savegame.ReadInt( entityDefBits );
1342 savegame.ReadBool( isServer );
1343 savegame.ReadBool( isClient );
1344
1345 savegame.ReadInt( localClientNum );
1346
1347 // snapshotEntities is used for multiplayer only
1348
1349 savegame.ReadInt( realClientTime );
1350 savegame.ReadBool( isNewFrame );
1351 savegame.ReadFloat( clientSmoothing );
1352
1353 savegame.ReadBool( mapCycleLoaded );
1354 savegame.ReadInt( spawnCount );
1355
1356 savegame.ReadInt( num );
1357 if ( num ) {
1358 if ( num != gameRenderWorld->NumAreas() ) {
1359 savegame.Error( "idGameLocal::InitFromSaveGame: number of areas in map differs from save game." );
1360 }
1361
1362 locationEntities = new idLocationEntity *[ num ];
1363 for( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
1364 savegame.ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( locationEntities[ i ] ) );
1365 }
1366 }
1367
1368 savegame.ReadObject( reinterpret_cast<idClass *&>( camera ) );
1369
1370 savegame.ReadMaterial( globalMaterial );
1371
1372 lastAIAlertEntity.Restore( &savegame );
1373 savegame.ReadInt( lastAIAlertTime );
1374
1375 savegame.ReadDict( &spawnArgs );
1376
1377 savegame.ReadInt( playerPVS.i );
1378 savegame.ReadInt( (int &)playerPVS.h );
1379 savegame.ReadInt( playerConnectedAreas.i );
1380 savegame.ReadInt( (int &)playerConnectedAreas.h );
1381
1382 savegame.ReadVec3( gravity );
1383
1384 // gamestate is restored after restoring everything else
1385
1386 savegame.ReadBool( influenceActive );
1387 savegame.ReadInt( nextGibTime );
1388
1389 // spawnSpots
1390 // initialSpots
1391 // currentInitialSpot
1392 // newInfo
1393 // makingBuild
1394 // shakeSounds
1395
1396 // Read out pending events
1397 idEvent::Restore( &savegame );
1398
1399 savegame.RestoreObjects();
1400
1401 mpGame.Reset();
1402
1403 mpGame.Precache();
1404
1405 // free up any unused animations
1406 animationLib.FlushUnusedAnims();
1407
1408 gamestate = GAMESTATE_ACTIVE;
1409
1410 Printf( "--------------------------------------\n" );
1411
1412 return true;
1413}
1414
1415/*
1416===========
1417idGameLocal::MapClear
1418===========
1419*/
1420void idGameLocal::MapClear( bool clearClients ) {
1421 int i;
1422
1423 for( i = ( clearClients ? 0 : MAX_CLIENTS ); i < MAX_GENTITIES; i++ ) {
1424 delete entities[ i ];
1425 // ~idEntity is in charge of setting the pointer to NULL
1426 // it will also clear pending events for this entity
1427 assert( !entities[ i ] );
1428 spawnIds[ i ] = -1;
1429 }
1430
1431 entityHash.Clear( 1024, MAX_GENTITIES );
1432
1433 if ( !clearClients ) {
1434 // add back the hashes of the clients
1435 for ( i = 0; i < MAX_CLIENTS; i++ ) {
1436 if ( !entities[ i ] ) {
1437 continue;
1438 }
1439 entityHash.Add( entityHash.GenerateKey( entities[ i ]->name.c_str(), true ), i );
1440 }
1441 }
1442
1443 delete frameCommandThread;
1444 frameCommandThread = NULL;
1445
1446 if ( editEntities ) {
1447 delete editEntities;
1448 editEntities = NULL;
1449 }
1450
1451 delete[] locationEntities;
1452 locationEntities = NULL;
1453}
1454
1455/*
1456===========
1457idGameLocal::MapShutdown
1458============
1459*/
1460void idGameLocal::MapShutdown( void ) {
1461 Printf( "--------- Game Map Shutdown ----------\n" );
1462
1463 gamestate = GAMESTATE_SHUTDOWN;
1464
1465 if ( gameRenderWorld ) {
1466 // clear any debug lines, text, and polygons
1467 gameRenderWorld->DebugClearLines( 0 );
1468 gameRenderWorld->DebugClearPolygons( 0 );
1469 }
1470
1471 // clear out camera if we're in a cinematic
1472 if ( inCinematic ) {
1473 camera = NULL;
1474 inCinematic = false;
1475 }
1476
1477 MapClear( true );
1478
1479 // reset the script to the state it was before the map was started
1480 program.Restart();
1481
1482 if ( smokeParticles ) {
1483 smokeParticles->Shutdown();
1484 }
1485
1486 pvs.Shutdown();
1487
1488 clip.Shutdown();
1489 idClipModel::ClearTraceModelCache();
1490
1491 ShutdownAsyncNetwork();
1492
1493 mapFileName.Clear();
1494
1495 gameRenderWorld = NULL;
1496 gameSoundWorld = NULL;
1497
1498 gamestate = GAMESTATE_NOMAP;
1499
1500 Printf( "--------------------------------------\n" );
1501}
1502
1503/*
1504===================
1505idGameLocal::DumpOggSounds
1506===================
1507*/
1508void idGameLocal::DumpOggSounds( void ) {
1509 int i, j, k, size, totalSize;
1510 idFile *file;
1511 idStrList oggSounds, weaponSounds;
1512 const idSoundShader *soundShader;
1513 const soundShaderParms_t *parms;
1514 idStr soundName;
1515
1516 for ( i = 0; i < declManager->GetNumDecls( DECL_SOUND ); i++ ) {
1517 soundShader = static_cast<const idSoundShader *>(declManager->DeclByIndex( DECL_SOUND, i, false ));
1518 parms = soundShader->GetParms();
1519
1520 if ( soundShader->EverReferenced() && soundShader->GetState() != DS_DEFAULTED ) {
1521
1522 const_cast<idSoundShader *>(soundShader)->EnsureNotPurged();
1523
1524 for ( j = 0; j < soundShader->GetNumSounds(); j++ ) {
1525 soundName = soundShader->GetSound( j );
1526 soundName.BackSlashesToSlashes();
1527
1528 // don't OGG sounds that cause a shake because that would
1529 // cause continuous seeking on the OGG file which is expensive
1530 if ( parms->shakes != 0.0f ) {
1531 shakeSounds.AddUnique( soundName );
1532 continue;
1533 }
1534
1535 // if not voice over or combat chatter
1536 if ( soundName.Find( "/vo/", false ) == -1 &&
1537 soundName.Find( "/combat_chatter/", false ) == -1 &&
1538 soundName.Find( "/bfgcarnage/", false ) == -1 &&
1539 soundName.Find( "/enpro/", false ) == - 1 &&
1540 soundName.Find( "/soulcube/energize_01.wav", false ) == -1 ) {
1541 // don't OGG weapon sounds
1542 if ( soundName.Find( "weapon", false ) != -1 ||
1543 soundName.Find( "gun", false ) != -1 ||
1544 soundName.Find( "bullet", false ) != -1 ||
1545 soundName.Find( "bfg", false ) != -1 ||
1546 soundName.Find( "plasma", false ) != -1 ) {
1547 weaponSounds.AddUnique( soundName );
1548 continue;
1549 }
1550 }
1551
1552 for ( k = 0; k < shakeSounds.Num(); k++ ) {
1553 if ( shakeSounds[k].IcmpPath( soundName ) == 0 ) {
1554 break;
1555 }
1556 }
1557 if ( k < shakeSounds.Num() ) {
1558 continue;
1559 }
1560
1561 oggSounds.AddUnique( soundName );
1562 }
1563 }
1564 }
1565
1566 file = fileSystem->OpenFileWrite( "makeogg.bat", "fs_savepath" );
1567 if ( file == NULL ) {
1568 common->Warning( "Couldn't open makeogg.bat" );
1569 return;
1570 }
1571
1572 // list all the shake sounds
1573 totalSize = 0;
1574 for ( i = 0; i < shakeSounds.Num(); i++ ) {
1575 size = fileSystem->ReadFile( shakeSounds[i], NULL, NULL );
1576 totalSize += size;
1577 shakeSounds[i].Replace( "/", "\\" );
1578 file->Printf( "echo \"%s\" (%d kB)\n", shakeSounds[i].c_str(), size >> 10 );
1579 }
1580 file->Printf( "echo %d kB in shake sounds\n\n\n", totalSize >> 10 );
1581
1582 // list all the weapon sounds
1583 totalSize = 0;
1584 for ( i = 0; i < weaponSounds.Num(); i++ ) {
1585 size = fileSystem->ReadFile( weaponSounds[i], NULL, NULL );
1586 totalSize += size;
1587 weaponSounds[i].Replace( "/", "\\" );
1588 file->Printf( "echo \"%s\" (%d kB)\n", weaponSounds[i].c_str(), size >> 10 );
1589 }
1590 file->Printf( "echo %d kB in weapon sounds\n\n\n", totalSize >> 10 );
1591
1592 // list commands to convert all other sounds to ogg
1593 totalSize = 0;
1594 for ( i = 0; i < oggSounds.Num(); i++ ) {
1595 size = fileSystem->ReadFile( oggSounds[i], NULL, NULL );
1596 totalSize += size;
1597 oggSounds[i].Replace( "/", "\\" );
1598 file->Printf( "w:\\doom\\ogg\\oggenc -q 0 \"c:\\doom\\base\\%s\"\n", oggSounds[i].c_str() );
1599 file->Printf( "del \"c:\\doom\\base\\%s\"\n", oggSounds[i].c_str() );
1600 }
1601 file->Printf( "\n\necho %d kB in OGG sounds\n\n\n", totalSize >> 10 );
1602
1603 fileSystem->CloseFile( file );
1604
1605 shakeSounds.Clear();
1606}
1607
1608/*
1609===================
1610idGameLocal::GetShakeSounds
1611===================
1612*/
1613void idGameLocal::GetShakeSounds( const idDict *dict ) {
1614 const idSoundShader *soundShader;
1615 const char *soundShaderName;
1616 idStr soundName;
1617
1618 soundShaderName = dict->GetString( "s_shader" );
1619 if ( soundShaderName != '\0' && dict->GetFloat( "s_shakes" ) != 0.0f ) {
1620 soundShader = declManager->FindSound( soundShaderName );
1621
1622 for ( int i = 0; i < soundShader->GetNumSounds(); i++ ) {
1623 soundName = soundShader->GetSound( i );
1624 soundName.BackSlashesToSlashes();
1625
1626 shakeSounds.AddUnique( soundName );
1627 }
1628 }
1629}
1630
1631/*
1632===================
1633idGameLocal::CacheDictionaryMedia
1634
1635This is called after parsing an EntityDef and for each entity spawnArgs before
1636merging the entitydef. It could be done post-merge, but that would
1637avoid the fast pre-cache check associated with each entityDef
1638===================
1639*/
1640void idGameLocal::CacheDictionaryMedia( const idDict *dict ) {
1641 const idKeyValue *kv;
1642
1643 if ( dict == NULL ) {
1644 if ( cvarSystem->GetCVarBool( "com_makingBuild") ) {
1645 DumpOggSounds();
1646 }
1647 return;
1648 }
1649
1650 if ( cvarSystem->GetCVarBool( "com_makingBuild" ) ) {
1651 GetShakeSounds( dict );
1652 }
1653
1654 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "model" );
1655 while( kv ) {
1656 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1657 declManager->MediaPrint( "Precaching model %s\n", kv->GetValue().c_str() );
1658 // precache model/animations
1659 if ( declManager->FindType( DECL_MODELDEF, kv->GetValue(), false ) == NULL ) {
1660 // precache the render model
1661 renderModelManager->FindModel( kv->GetValue() );
1662 // precache .cm files only
1663 collisionModelManager->LoadModel( kv->GetValue(), true );
1664 }
1665 }
1666 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "model", kv );
1667 }
1668
1669 kv = dict->FindKey( "s_shader" );
1670 if ( kv && kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1671 declManager->FindType( DECL_SOUND, kv->GetValue() );
1672 }
1673
1674 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "snd", NULL );
1675 while( kv ) {
1676 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1677 declManager->FindType( DECL_SOUND, kv->GetValue() );
1678 }
1679 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "snd", kv );
1680 }
1681
1682
1683 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "gui", NULL );
1684 while( kv ) {
1685 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1686 if ( !idStr::Icmp( kv->GetKey(), "gui_noninteractive" )
1687 || !idStr::Icmpn( kv->GetKey(), "gui_parm", 8 )
1688 || !idStr::Icmp( kv->GetKey(), "gui_inventory" ) ) {
1689 // unfortunate flag names, they aren't actually a gui
1690 } else {
1691 declManager->MediaPrint( "Precaching gui %s\n", kv->GetValue().c_str() );
1692 idUserInterface *gui = uiManager->Alloc();
1693 if ( gui ) {
1694 gui->InitFromFile( kv->GetValue() );
1695 uiManager->DeAlloc( gui );
1696 }
1697 }
1698 }
1699 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "gui", kv );
1700 }
1701
1702 kv = dict->FindKey( "texture" );
1703 if ( kv && kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1704 declManager->FindType( DECL_MATERIAL, kv->GetValue() );
1705 }
1706
1707 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "mtr", NULL );
1708 while( kv ) {
1709 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1710 declManager->FindType( DECL_MATERIAL, kv->GetValue() );
1711 }
1712 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "mtr", kv );
1713 }
1714
1715 // handles hud icons
1716 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "inv_icon", NULL );
1717 while ( kv ) {
1718 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1719 declManager->FindType( DECL_MATERIAL, kv->GetValue() );
1720 }
1721 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "inv_icon", kv );
1722 }
1723
1724 // handles teleport fx.. this is not ideal but the actual decision on which fx to use
1725 // is handled by script code based on the teleport number
1726 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "teleport", NULL );
1727 if ( kv && kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1728 int teleportType = atoi( kv->GetValue() );
1729 const char *p = ( teleportType ) ? va( "fx/teleporter%i.fx", teleportType ) : "fx/teleporter.fx";
1730 declManager->FindType( DECL_FX, p );
1731 }
1732
1733 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "fx", NULL );
1734 while( kv ) {
1735 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1736 declManager->MediaPrint( "Precaching fx %s\n", kv->GetValue().c_str() );
1737 declManager->FindType( DECL_FX, kv->GetValue() );
1738 }
1739 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "fx", kv );
1740 }
1741
1742 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "smoke", NULL );
1743 while( kv ) {
1744 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1745 idStr prtName = kv->GetValue();
1746 int dash = prtName.Find('-');
1747 if ( dash > 0 ) {
1748 prtName = prtName.Left( dash );
1749 }
1750 declManager->FindType( DECL_PARTICLE, prtName );
1751 }
1752 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "smoke", kv );
1753 }
1754
1755 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "skin", NULL );
1756 while( kv ) {
1757 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1758 declManager->MediaPrint( "Precaching skin %s\n", kv->GetValue().c_str() );
1759 declManager->FindType( DECL_SKIN, kv->GetValue() );
1760 }
1761 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "skin", kv );
1762 }
1763
1764 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "def", NULL );
1765 while( kv ) {
1766 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1767 FindEntityDef( kv->GetValue().c_str(), false );
1768 }
1769 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "def", kv );
1770 }
1771
1772 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "pda_name", NULL );
1773 while( kv ) {
1774 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1775 declManager->FindType( DECL_PDA, kv->GetValue().c_str(), false );
1776 }
1777 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "pda_name", kv );
1778 }
1779
1780 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "video", NULL );
1781 while( kv ) {
1782 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1783 declManager->FindType( DECL_VIDEO, kv->GetValue().c_str(), false );
1784 }
1785 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "video", kv );
1786 }
1787
1788 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "audio", NULL );
1789 while( kv ) {
1790 if ( kv->GetValue().Length() ) {
1791 declManager->FindType( DECL_AUDIO, kv->GetValue().c_str(), false );
1792 }
1793 kv = dict->MatchPrefix( "audio", kv );
1794 }
1795}

1797/*
1798===========
1799idGameLocal::InitScriptForMap
1800============
1801*/
1802void idGameLocal::InitScriptForMap( void ) {
1803 // create a thread to run frame commands on
1804 frameCommandThread = new idThread();
1805 frameCommandThread->ManualDelete();
1806 frameCommandThread->SetThreadName( "frameCommands" );
1807
1808 // run the main game script function (not the level specific main)
1809 const function_t *func = program.FindFunction( SCRIPT_DEFAULTFUNC );
1810 if ( func != NULL ) {
1811 idThread *thread = new idThread( func );
1812 if ( thread->Start() ) {
1813 // thread has finished executing, so delete it
1814 delete thread;
1815 }
1816 }
1817}

1819/*
1820===========
1821idGameLocal::SpawnPlayer
1822============
1823*/
1824void idGameLocal::SpawnPlayer( int clientNum ) {
1825 idEntity *ent;
1826 idDict args;
1827
1828 // they can connect
1829 Printf( "SpawnPlayer: %i\n", clientNum );
1830
1831 args.SetInt( "spawn_entnum", clientNum );
1832 args.Set( "name", va( "player%d", clientNum + 1 ) );
1833 args.Set( "classname", isMultiplayer ? "player_doommarine_mp" : "player_doommarine" );
1834 if ( !SpawnEntityDef( args, &ent ) || !entities[ clientNum ] ) {
1835 Error( "Failed to spawn player as '%s'", args.GetString( "classname" ) );
1836 }
1837
1838 // make sure it's a compatible class
1839 if ( !ent->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
1840 Error( "'%s' spawned the player as a '%s'. Player spawnclass must be a subclass of idPlayer.", args.GetString( "classname" ), ent->GetClassname() );
1841 }
1842
1843 if ( clientNum >= numClients ) {
1844 numClients = clientNum + 1;
1845 }
1846
1847 mpGame.SpawnPlayer( clientNum );
1848}

1850/*
1851================
1852idGameLocal::GetClientByNum
1853================
1854*/
1855idPlayer *idGameLocal::GetClientByNum( int current ) const {
1856 if ( current < 0 || current >= numClients ) {
1857 current = 0;
1858 }
1859 if ( entities[current] ) {
1860 return static_cast<idPlayer *>( entities[ current ] );
1861 }
1862 return NULL;
1863}

1865/*
1866================
1867idGameLocal::GetClientByName
1868================
1869*/
1870idPlayer *idGameLocal::GetClientByName( const char *name ) const {
1871 int i;
1872 idEntity *ent;
1873 for ( i = 0 ; i < numClients ; i++ ) {
1874 ent = entities[ i ];
1875 if ( ent && ent->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
1876 if ( idStr::IcmpNoColor( name, userInfo[ i ].GetString( "ui_name" ) ) == 0 ) {
1877 return static_cast<idPlayer *>( ent );
1878 }
1879 }
1880 }
1881 return NULL;
1882}

1884/*
1885================
1886idGameLocal::GetClientByCmdArgs
1887================
1888*/
1889idPlayer *idGameLocal::GetClientByCmdArgs( const idCmdArgs &args ) const {
1890 idPlayer *player;
1891 idStr client = args.Argv( 1 );
1892 if ( !client.Length() ) {
1893 return NULL;
1894 }
1895 // we don't allow numeric ui_name so this can't go wrong
1896 if ( client.IsNumeric() ) {
1897 player = GetClientByNum( atoi( client.c_str() ) );
1898 } else {
1899 player = GetClientByName( client.c_str() );
1900 }
1901 if ( !player ) {
1902 common->Printf( "Player '%s' not found\n", client.c_str() );
1903 }
1904 return player;
1905}

1907/*
1908================
1909idGameLocal::GetNextClientNum
1910================
1911*/
1912int idGameLocal::GetNextClientNum( int _current ) const {
1913 int i, current;
1914
1915 current = 0;
1916 for ( i = 0; i < numClients; i++) {
1917 current = ( _current + i + 1 ) % numClients;
1918 if ( entities[ current ] && entities[ current ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
1919 return current;
1920 }
1921 }
1922
1923 return current;
1924}

1926/*
1927================
1928idGameLocal::GetLocalPlayer
1929
1930Nothing in the game tic should EVER make a decision based on what the
1931local client number is, it shouldn't even be aware that there is a
1932draw phase even happening. This just returns client 0, which will
1933be correct for single player.
1934================
1935*/
1936idPlayer *idGameLocal::GetLocalPlayer() const {
1937 if ( localClientNum < 0 ) {
1938 return NULL;
1939 }
1940
1941 if ( !entities[ localClientNum ] || !entities[ localClientNum ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
1942 // not fully in game yet
1943 return NULL;
1944 }
1945 return static_cast<idPlayer *>( entities[ localClientNum ] );
1946}

1948/*
1949================
1950idGameLocal::SetupClientPVS
1951================
1952*/
1953pvsHandle_t idGameLocal::GetClientPVS( idPlayer *player, pvsType_t type ) {
1954 if ( player->GetPrivateCameraView() ) {
1955 return pvs.SetupCurrentPVS( player->GetPrivateCameraView()->GetPVSAreas(), player->GetPrivateCameraView()->GetNumPVSAreas() );
1956 } else if ( camera ) {
1957 return pvs.SetupCurrentPVS( camera->GetPVSAreas(), camera->GetNumPVSAreas() );
1958 } else {
1959 return pvs.SetupCurrentPVS( player->GetPVSAreas(), player->GetNumPVSAreas() );
1960 }
1961}
1962
1963/*
1964================
1965idGameLocal::SetupPlayerPVS
1966================
1967*/
1968void idGameLocal::SetupPlayerPVS( void ) {
1969 int i;
1970 idEntity * ent;
1971 idPlayer * player;
1972 pvsHandle_t otherPVS, newPVS;
1973
1974 playerPVS.i = -1;
1975 for ( i = 0; i < numClients; i++ ) {
1976 ent = entities[i];
1977 if ( !ent || !ent->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
1978 continue;
1979 }
1980
1981 player = static_cast<idPlayer *>(ent);
1982
1983 if ( playerPVS.i == -1 ) {
1984 playerPVS = GetClientPVS( player, PVS_NORMAL );
1985 } else {
1986 otherPVS = GetClientPVS( player, PVS_NORMAL );
1987 newPVS = pvs.MergeCurrentPVS( playerPVS, otherPVS );
1988 pvs.FreeCurrentPVS( playerPVS );
1989 pvs.FreeCurrentPVS( otherPVS );
1990 playerPVS = newPVS;
1991 }
1992
1993 if ( playerConnectedAreas.i == -1 ) {
1994 playerConnectedAreas = GetClientPVS( player, PVS_CONNECTED_AREAS );
1995 } else {
1996 otherPVS = GetClientPVS( player, PVS_CONNECTED_AREAS );
1997 newPVS = pvs.MergeCurrentPVS( playerConnectedAreas, otherPVS );
1998 pvs.FreeCurrentPVS( playerConnectedAreas );
1999 pvs.FreeCurrentPVS( otherPVS );
2000 playerConnectedAreas = newPVS;
2001 }
2002 }
2003}
2004
2005/*
2006================
2007idGameLocal::FreePlayerPVS
2008================
2009*/
2010void idGameLocal::FreePlayerPVS( void ) {
2011 if ( playerPVS.i != -1 ) {
2012 pvs.FreeCurrentPVS( playerPVS );
2013 playerPVS.i = -1;
2014 }
2015 if ( playerConnectedAreas.i != -1 ) {
2016 pvs.FreeCurrentPVS( playerConnectedAreas );
2017 playerConnectedAreas.i = -1;
2018 }
2019}
2020
2021/*
2022================
2023idGameLocal::InPlayerPVS
2024
2025 should only be called during entity thinking and event handling
2026================
2027*/
2028bool idGameLocal::InPlayerPVS( idEntity *ent ) const {
2029 if ( playerPVS.i == -1 ) {
2030 return false;
2031 }
2032 return pvs.InCurrentPVS( playerPVS, ent->GetPVSAreas(), ent->GetNumPVSAreas() );
2033}

2049/*
2050================
2051idGameLocal::UpdateGravity
2052================
2053*/
2054void idGameLocal::UpdateGravity( void ) {
2055 idEntity *ent;
2056
2057 if ( g_gravity.IsModified() ) {
2058 if ( g_gravity.GetFloat() == 0.0f ) {
2059 g_gravity.SetFloat( 1.0f );
2060 }
2061 gravity.Set( 0, 0, -g_gravity.GetFloat() );
2062
2063 // update all physics objects
2064 for( ent = spawnedEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
2065 if ( ent->IsType( idAFEntity_Generic::Type ) ) {
2066 idPhysics *phys = ent->GetPhysics();
2067 if ( phys ) {
2068 phys->SetGravity( gravity );
2069 }
2070 }
2071 }
2072 g_gravity.ClearModified();
2073 }
2074}
2075
2076/*
2077================
2078idGameLocal::GetGravity
2079================
2080*/
2081const idVec3 &idGameLocal::GetGravity( void ) const {
2082 return gravity;
2083}
2084
2085/*
2086================
2087idGameLocal::SortActiveEntityList
2088
2089 Sorts the active entity list such that pushing entities come first,
2090 actors come next and physics team slaves appear after their master.
2091================
2092*/
2093void idGameLocal::SortActiveEntityList( void ) {
2094 idEntity *ent, *next_ent, *master, *part;
2095
2096 // if the active entity list needs to be reordered to place physics team masters at the front
2097 if ( sortTeamMasters ) {
2098 for ( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = next_ent ) {
2099 next_ent = ent->activeNode.Next();
2100 master = ent->GetTeamMaster();
2101 if ( master && master == ent ) {
2102 ent->activeNode.Remove();
2103 ent->activeNode.AddToFront( activeEntities );
2104 }
2105 }
2106 }
2107
2108 // if the active entity list needs to be reordered to place pushers at the front
2109 if ( sortPushers ) {
2110
2111 for ( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = next_ent ) {
2112 next_ent = ent->activeNode.Next();
2113 master = ent->GetTeamMaster();
2114 if ( !master || master == ent ) {
2115 // check if there is an actor on the team
2116 for ( part = ent; part != NULL; part = part->GetNextTeamEntity() ) {
2117 if ( part->GetPhysics()->IsType( idPhysics_Actor::Type ) ) {
2118 break;
2119 }
2120 }
2121 // if there is an actor on the team
2122 if ( part ) {
2123 ent->activeNode.Remove();
2124 ent->activeNode.AddToFront( activeEntities );
2125 }
2126 }
2127 }
2128
2129 for ( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = next_ent ) {
2130 next_ent = ent->activeNode.Next();
2131 master = ent->GetTeamMaster();
2132 if ( !master || master == ent ) {
2133 // check if there is an entity on the team using parametric physics
2134 for ( part = ent; part != NULL; part = part->GetNextTeamEntity() ) {
2135 if ( part->GetPhysics()->IsType( idPhysics_Parametric::Type ) ) {
2136 break;
2137 }
2138 }
2139 // if there is an entity on the team using parametric physics
2140 if ( part ) {
2141 ent->activeNode.Remove();
2142 ent->activeNode.AddToFront( activeEntities );
2143 }
2144 }
2145 }
2146 }
2147
2148 sortTeamMasters = false;
2149 sortPushers = false;
2150}
2151
2152/*
2153================
2154idGameLocal::RunFrame
2155================
2156*/
2157gameReturn_t idGameLocal::RunFrame( const usercmd_t *clientCmds ) {
2158 idEntity * ent;
2159 int num;
2160 float ms;
2161 idTimer timer_think, timer_events, timer_singlethink;
2162 gameReturn_t ret;
2163 idPlayer *player;
2164 const renderView_t *view;
2165
2166#ifdef _DEBUG
2167 if ( isMultiplayer ) {
2168 assert( !isClient );
2169 }
2170#endif
2171
2172 player = GetLocalPlayer();
2173
2174 if ( !isMultiplayer && g_stopTime.GetBool() ) {
2175 // clear any debug lines from a previous frame
2176 gameRenderWorld->DebugClearLines( time + 1 );
2177
2178 // set the user commands for this frame
2179 memcpy( usercmds, clientCmds, numClients * sizeof( usercmds[ 0 ] ) );
2180
2181 if ( player ) {
2182 player->Think();
2183 }
2184 } else do {
2185 // update the game time
2186 framenum++;
2187 previousTime = time;
2188 time += msec;
2189 realClientTime = time;
2190
2191#ifdef GAME_DLL
2192 // allow changing SIMD usage on the fly
2193 if ( com_forceGenericSIMD.IsModified() ) {
2194 idSIMD::InitProcessor( "game", com_forceGenericSIMD.GetBool() );
2195 }
2196#endif
2197
2198 // make sure the random number counter is used each frame so random events
2199 // are influenced by the player's actions
2200 random.RandomInt();
2201
2202 if ( player ) {
2203 // update the renderview so that any gui videos play from the right frame
2204 view = player->GetRenderView();
2205 if ( view ) {
2206 gameRenderWorld->SetRenderView( view );
2207 }
2208 }
2209
2210 // clear any debug lines from a previous frame
2211 gameRenderWorld->DebugClearLines( time );
2212
2213 // clear any debug polygons from a previous frame
2214 gameRenderWorld->DebugClearPolygons( time );
2215
2216 // set the user commands for this frame
2217 memcpy( usercmds, clientCmds, numClients * sizeof( usercmds[ 0 ] ) );
2218
2219 // free old smoke particles
2220 smokeParticles->FreeSmokes();
2221
2222 // process events on the server
2223 ServerProcessEntityNetworkEventQueue();
2224
2225 // update our gravity vector if needed.
2226 UpdateGravity();
2227
2228 // create a merged pvs for all players
2229 SetupPlayerPVS();
2230
2231 // sort the active entity list
2232 SortActiveEntityList();
2233
2234 timer_think.Clear();
2235 timer_think.Start();
2236
2237 // let entities think
2238 if ( g_timeentities.GetFloat() ) {
2239 num = 0;
2240 for( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->activeNode.Next() ) {
2241 if ( g_cinematic.GetBool() && inCinematic && !ent->cinematic ) {
2242 ent->GetPhysics()->UpdateTime( time );
2243 continue;
2244 }
2245 timer_singlethink.Clear();
2246 timer_singlethink.Start();
2247 ent->Think();
2248 timer_singlethink.Stop();
2249 ms = timer_singlethink.Milliseconds();
2250 if ( ms >= g_timeentities.GetFloat() ) {
2251 Printf( "%d: entity '%s': %.1f ms\n", time, ent->name.c_str(), ms );
2252 }
2253 num++;
2254 }
2255 } else {
2256 if ( inCinematic ) {
2257 num = 0;
2258 for( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->activeNode.Next() ) {
2259 if ( g_cinematic.GetBool() && !ent->cinematic ) {
2260 ent->GetPhysics()->UpdateTime( time );
2261 continue;
2262 }
2263 ent->Think();
2264 num++;
2265 }
2266 } else {
2267 num = 0;
2268 for( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->activeNode.Next() ) {
2269 ent->Think();
2270 num++;
2271 }
2272 }
2273 }
2274
2275 // remove any entities that have stopped thinking
2276 if ( numEntitiesToDeactivate ) {
2277 idEntity *next_ent;
2278 int c = 0;
2279 for( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = next_ent ) {
2280 next_ent = ent->activeNode.Next();
2281 if ( !ent->thinkFlags ) {
2282 ent->activeNode.Remove();
2283 c++;
2284 }
2285 }
2286 //assert( numEntitiesToDeactivate == c );
2287 numEntitiesToDeactivate = 0;
2288 }
2289
2290 timer_think.Stop();
2291 timer_events.Clear();
2292 timer_events.Start();
2293
2294 // service any pending events
2295 idEvent::ServiceEvents();
2296
2297 timer_events.Stop();
2298
2299 // free the player pvs
2300 FreePlayerPVS();
2301
2302 // do multiplayer related stuff
2303 if ( isMultiplayer ) {
2304 mpGame.Run();
2305 }
2306
2307 // display how long it took to calculate the current game frame
2308 if ( g_frametime.GetBool() ) {
2309 Printf( "game %d: all:%.1f th:%.1f ev:%.1f %d ents \n",
2310 time, timer_think.Milliseconds() + timer_events.Milliseconds(),
2311 timer_think.Milliseconds(), timer_events.Milliseconds(), num );
2312 }
2313
2314 // build the return value
2315 ret.consistencyHash = 0;
2316 ret.sessionCommand[0] = 0;
2317
2318 if ( !isMultiplayer && player ) {
2319 ret.health = player->health;
2320 ret.heartRate = player->heartRate;
2321 ret.stamina = idMath::FtoiFast( player->stamina );
2322 // combat is a 0-100 value based on lastHitTime and lastDmgTime
2323 // each make up 50% of the time spread over 10 seconds
2324 ret.combat = 0;
2325 if ( player->lastDmgTime > 0 && time < player->lastDmgTime + 10000 ) {
2326 ret.combat += 50.0f * (float) ( time - player->lastDmgTime ) / 10000;
2327 }
2328 if ( player->lastHitTime > 0 && time < player->lastHitTime + 10000 ) {
2329 ret.combat += 50.0f * (float) ( time - player->lastHitTime ) / 10000;
2330 }
2331 }
2332
2333 // see if a target_sessionCommand has forced a changelevel
2334 if ( sessionCommand.Length() ) {
2335 strncpy( ret.sessionCommand, sessionCommand, sizeof( ret.sessionCommand ) );
2336 break;
2337 }
2338
2339 // make sure we don't loop forever when skipping a cinematic
2340 if ( skipCinematic && ( time > cinematicMaxSkipTime ) ) {
2341 Warning( "Exceeded maximum cinematic skip length. Cinematic may be looping infinitely." );
2342 skipCinematic = false;
2343 break;
2344 }
2345 } while( ( inCinematic || ( time < cinematicStopTime ) ) && skipCinematic );
2346
2347 ret.syncNextGameFrame = skipCinematic;
2348 if ( skipCinematic ) {
2349 soundSystem->SetMute( false );
2350 skipCinematic = false;
2351 }
2352
2353 // show any debug info for this frame
2354 RunDebugInfo();
2355 D_DrawDebugLines();
2356
2357 return ret;
2358}
2359
2360
2361/*
2362======================================================================
2363
2364 Game view drawing
2365
2366======================================================================
2367*/
2368
2369/*
2370====================
2371idGameLocal::CalcFov
2372
2373Calculates the horizontal and vertical field of view based on a horizontal field of view and custom aspect ratio
2374====================
2375*/
2376void idGameLocal::CalcFov( float base_fov, float &fov_x, float &fov_y ) const {
2377 float x;
2378 float y;
2379 float ratio_x;
2380 float ratio_y;
2381
2382 if ( !sys->FPU_StackIsEmpty() ) {
2383 Printf( sys->FPU_GetState() );
2384 Error( "idGameLocal::CalcFov: FPU stack not empty" );
2385 }
2386
2387 // first, calculate the vertical fov based on a 640x480 view
2388 x = 640.0f / tan( base_fov / 360.0f * idMath::PI );
2389 y = atan2( 480.0f, x );
2390 fov_y = y * 360.0f / idMath::PI;
2391
2392 // FIXME: somehow, this is happening occasionally
2393 assert( fov_y > 0 );
2394 if ( fov_y <= 0 ) {
2395 Printf( sys->FPU_GetState() );
2396 Error( "idGameLocal::CalcFov: bad result" );
2397 }
2398
2399 switch( r_aspectRatio.GetInteger() ) {
2400 default :
2401 case 0 :
2402 // 4:3
2403 fov_x = base_fov;
2404 return;
2405 break;
2406
2407 case 1 :
2408 // 16:9
2409 ratio_x = 16.0f;
2410 ratio_y = 9.0f;
2411 break;
2412
2413 case 2 :
2414 // 16:10
2415 ratio_x = 16.0f;
2416 ratio_y = 10.0f;
2417 break;
2418 }
2419
2420 y = ratio_y / tan( fov_y / 360.0f * idMath::PI );
2421 fov_x = atan2( ratio_x, y ) * 360.0f / idMath::PI;
2422
2423 if ( fov_x < base_fov ) {
2424 fov_x = base_fov;
2425 x = ratio_x / tan( fov_x / 360.0f * idMath::PI );
2426 fov_y = atan2( ratio_y, x ) * 360.0f / idMath::PI;
2427 }
2428
2429 // FIXME: somehow, this is happening occasionally
2430 assert( ( fov_x > 0 ) && ( fov_y > 0 ) );
2431 if ( ( fov_y <= 0 ) || ( fov_x <= 0 ) ) {
2432 Printf( sys->FPU_GetState() );
2433 Error( "idGameLocal::CalcFov: bad result" );
2434 }
2435}

2580/*
2581================
2582idGameLocal::ShowTargets
2583================
2584*/
2585void idGameLocal::ShowTargets( void ) {
2586 idMat3 axis = GetLocalPlayer()->viewAngles.ToMat3();
2587 idVec3 up = axis[ 2 ] * 5.0f;
2588 const idVec3 &viewPos = GetLocalPlayer()->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
2589 idBounds viewTextBounds( viewPos );
2590 idBounds viewBounds( viewPos );
2591 idBounds box( idVec3( -4.0f, -4.0f, -4.0f ), idVec3( 4.0f, 4.0f, 4.0f ) );
2592 idEntity *ent;
2593 idEntity *target;
2594 int i;
2595 idBounds totalBounds;
2596
2597 viewTextBounds.ExpandSelf( 128.0f );
2598 viewBounds.ExpandSelf( 512.0f );
2599 for( ent = spawnedEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
2600 totalBounds = ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds();
2601 for( i = 0; i < ent->targets.Num(); i++ ) {
2602 target = ent->targets[ i ].GetEntity();
2603 if ( target ) {
2604 totalBounds.AddBounds( target->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds() );
2605 }
2606 }
2607
2608 if ( !viewBounds.IntersectsBounds( totalBounds ) ) {
2609 continue;
2610 }
2611
2612 float dist;
2613 idVec3 dir = totalBounds.GetCenter() - viewPos;
2614 dir.NormalizeFast();
2615 totalBounds.RayIntersection( viewPos, dir, dist );
2616 float frac = ( 512.0f - dist ) / 512.0f;
2617 if ( frac < 0.0f ) {
2618 continue;
2619 }
2620
2621 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( ( ent->IsHidden() ? colorLtGrey : colorOrange ) * frac, ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds() );
2622 if ( viewTextBounds.IntersectsBounds( ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds() ) ) {
2623 idVec3 center = ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds().GetCenter();
2624 gameRenderWorld->DrawText( ent->name.c_str(), center - up, 0.1f, colorWhite * frac, axis, 1 );
2625 gameRenderWorld->DrawText( ent->GetEntityDefName(), center, 0.1f, colorWhite * frac, axis, 1 );
2626 gameRenderWorld->DrawText( va( "#%d", ent->entityNumber ), center + up, 0.1f, colorWhite * frac, axis, 1 );
2627 }
2628
2629 for( i = 0; i < ent->targets.Num(); i++ ) {
2630 target = ent->targets[ i ].GetEntity();
2631 if ( target ) {
2632 gameRenderWorld->DebugArrow( colorYellow * frac, ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds().GetCenter(), target->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin(), 10, 0 );
2633 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorGreen * frac, box, target->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() );
2634 }
2635 }
2636 }
2637}
2638
2639/*
2640================
2641idGameLocal::RunDebugInfo
2642================
2643*/
2644void idGameLocal::RunDebugInfo( void ) {
2645 idEntity *ent;
2646 idPlayer *player;
2647
2648 player = GetLocalPlayer();
2649 if ( !player ) {
2650 return;
2651 }
2652
2653 const idVec3 &origin = player->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
2654
2655 if ( g_showEntityInfo.GetBool() ) {
2656 idMat3 axis = player->viewAngles.ToMat3();
2657 idVec3 up = axis[ 2 ] * 5.0f;
2658 idBounds viewTextBounds( origin );
2659 idBounds viewBounds( origin );
2660
2661 viewTextBounds.ExpandSelf( 128.0f );
2662 viewBounds.ExpandSelf( 512.0f );
2663 for( ent = spawnedEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
2664 // don't draw the worldspawn
2665 if ( ent == world ) {
2666 continue;
2667 }
2668
2669 // skip if the entity is very far away
2670 if ( !viewBounds.IntersectsBounds( ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds() ) ) {
2671 continue;
2672 }
2673
2674 const idBounds &entBounds = ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds();
2675 int contents = ent->GetPhysics()->GetContents();
2676 if ( contents & CONTENTS_BODY ) {
2677 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorCyan, entBounds );
2678 } else if ( contents & CONTENTS_TRIGGER ) {
2679 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorOrange, entBounds );
2680 } else if ( contents & CONTENTS_SOLID ) {
2681 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorGreen, entBounds );
2682 } else {
2683 if ( !entBounds.GetVolume() ) {
2684 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorMdGrey, entBounds.Expand( 8.0f ) );
2685 } else {
2686 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorMdGrey, entBounds );
2687 }
2688 }
2689 if ( viewTextBounds.IntersectsBounds( entBounds ) ) {
2690 gameRenderWorld->DrawText( ent->name.c_str(), entBounds.GetCenter(), 0.1f, colorWhite, axis, 1 );
2691 gameRenderWorld->DrawText( va( "#%d", ent->entityNumber ), entBounds.GetCenter() + up, 0.1f, colorWhite, axis, 1 );
2692 }
2693 }
2694 }
2695
2696 // debug tool to draw bounding boxes around active entities
2697 if ( g_showActiveEntities.GetBool() ) {
2698 for( ent = activeEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->activeNode.Next() ) {
2699 idBounds b = ent->GetPhysics()->GetBounds();
2700 if ( b.GetVolume() <= 0 ) {
2701 b[0][0] = b[0][1] = b[0][2] = -8;
2702 b[1][0] = b[1][1] = b[1][2] = 8;
2703 }
2704 if ( ent->fl.isDormant ) {
2705 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorYellow, b, ent->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() );
2706 } else {
2707 gameRenderWorld->DebugBounds( colorGreen, b, ent->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() );
2708 }
2709 }
2710 }
2711
2712 if ( g_showTargets.GetBool() ) {
2713 ShowTargets();
2714 }
2715
2716 if ( g_showTriggers.GetBool() ) {
2717 idTrigger::DrawDebugInfo();
2718 }
2719
2720 if ( ai_showCombatNodes.GetBool() ) {
2721 idCombatNode::DrawDebugInfo();
2722 }
2723
2724 if ( ai_showPaths.GetBool() ) {
2725 idPathCorner::DrawDebugInfo();
2726 }
2727
2728 if ( g_editEntityMode.GetBool() ) {
2729 editEntities->DisplayEntities();
2730 }
2731
2732 if ( g_showCollisionWorld.GetBool() ) {
2733 collisionModelManager->DrawModel( 0, vec3_origin, mat3_identity, origin, 128.0f );
2734 }
2735
2736 if ( g_showCollisionModels.GetBool() ) {
2737 clip.DrawClipModels( player->GetEyePosition(), g_maxShowDistance.GetFloat(), pm_thirdPerson.GetBool() ? NULL : player );
2738 }
2739
2740 if ( g_showCollisionTraces.GetBool() ) {
2741 clip.PrintStatistics();
2742 }
2743
2744 if ( g_showPVS.GetInteger() ) {
2745 pvs.DrawPVS( origin, ( g_showPVS.GetInteger() == 2 ) ? PVS_ALL_PORTALS_OPEN : PVS_NORMAL );
2746 }
2747
2748 if ( aas_test.GetInteger() >= 0 ) {
2749 idAAS *aas = GetAAS( aas_test.GetInteger() );
2750 if ( aas ) {
2751 aas->Test( origin );
2752 if ( ai_testPredictPath.GetBool() ) {
2753 idVec3 velocity;
2754 predictedPath_t path;
2755
2756 velocity.x = cos( DEG2RAD( player->viewAngles.yaw ) ) * 100.0f;
2757 velocity.y = sin( DEG2RAD( player->viewAngles.yaw ) ) * 100.0f;
2758 velocity.z = 0.0f;
2759 idAI::PredictPath( player, aas, origin, velocity, 1000, 100, SE_ENTER_OBSTACLE | SE_BLOCKED | SE_ENTER_LEDGE_AREA, path );
2760 }
2761 }
2762 }
2763
2764 if ( ai_showObstacleAvoidance.GetInteger() == 2 ) {
2765 idAAS *aas = GetAAS( 0 );
2766 if ( aas ) {
2767 idVec3 seekPos;
2768 obstaclePath_t path;
2769
2770 seekPos = player->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() + player->viewAxis[0] * 200.0f;
2771 idAI::FindPathAroundObstacles( player->GetPhysics(), aas, NULL, player->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin(), seekPos, path );
2772 }
2773 }
2774
2775 // collision map debug output
2776 collisionModelManager->DebugOutput( player->GetEyePosition() );
2777}

2835/*
2836==================
2837idGameLocal::AddAASObstacle
2838==================
2839*/
2840aasHandle_t idGameLocal::AddAASObstacle( const idBounds &bounds ) {
2841 int i;
2842 aasHandle_t obstacle;
2843 aasHandle_t check;
2844
2845 if ( !aasList.Num() ) {
2846 return -1;
2847 }
2848
2849 obstacle = aasList[ 0 ]->AddObstacle( bounds );
2850 for( i = 1; i < aasList.Num(); i++ ) {
2851 check = aasList[ i ]->AddObstacle( bounds );
2852 assert( check == obstacle );
2853 }
2854
2855 return obstacle;
2856}

2884/*
2885==================
2886idGameLocal::CheatsOk
2887==================
2888*/
2889bool idGameLocal::CheatsOk( bool requirePlayer ) {
2890 idPlayer *player;
2891
2892 if ( isMultiplayer && !cvarSystem->GetCVarBool( "net_allowCheats" ) ) {
2893 Printf( "Not allowed in multiplayer.\n" );
2894 return false;
2895 }
2896
2897 if ( developer.GetBool() ) {
2898 return true;
2899 }
2900
2901 player = GetLocalPlayer();
2902 if ( !requirePlayer || ( player && ( player->health > 0 ) ) ) {
2903 return true;
2904 }
2905
2906 Printf( "You must be alive to use this command.\n" );
2907
2908 return false;
2909}
2910
2911/*
2912===================
2913idGameLocal::RegisterEntity
2914===================
2915*/
2916void idGameLocal::RegisterEntity( idEntity *ent ) {
2917 int spawn_entnum;
2918
2919 if ( spawnCount >= ( 1 << ( 32 - GENTITYNUM_BITS ) ) ) {
2920 Error( "idGameLocal::RegisterEntity: spawn count overflow" );
2921 }
2922
2923 if ( !spawnArgs.GetInt( "spawn_entnum", "0", spawn_entnum ) ) {
2924 while( entities[firstFreeIndex] && firstFreeIndex < ENTITYNUM_MAX_NORMAL ) {
2925 firstFreeIndex++;
2926 }
2927 if ( firstFreeIndex >= ENTITYNUM_MAX_NORMAL ) {
2928 Error( "no free entities" );
2929 }
2930 spawn_entnum = firstFreeIndex++;
2931 }
2932
2933 entities[ spawn_entnum ] = ent;
2934 spawnIds[ spawn_entnum ] = spawnCount++;
2935 ent->entityNumber = spawn_entnum;
2936 ent->spawnNode.AddToEnd( spawnedEntities );
2937 ent->spawnArgs.TransferKeyValues( spawnArgs );
2938
2939 if ( spawn_entnum >= num_entities ) {
2940 num_entities++;
2941 }
2942}
2943
2944/*
2945===================
2946idGameLocal::UnregisterEntity
2947===================
2948*/
2949void idGameLocal::UnregisterEntity( idEntity *ent ) {
2950 assert( ent );
2951
2952 if ( editEntities ) {
2953 editEntities->RemoveSelectedEntity( ent );
2954 }
2955
2956 if ( ( ent->entityNumber != ENTITYNUM_NONE ) && ( entities[ ent->entityNumber ] == ent ) ) {
2957 ent->spawnNode.Remove();
2958 entities[ ent->entityNumber ] = NULL;
2959 spawnIds[ ent->entityNumber ] = -1;
2960 if ( ent->entityNumber >= MAX_CLIENTS && ent->entityNumber < firstFreeIndex ) {
2961 firstFreeIndex = ent->entityNumber;
2962 }
2963 ent->entityNumber = ENTITYNUM_NONE;
2964 }
2965}
2966
2967/*
2968================
2969idGameLocal::SpawnEntityType
2970================
2971*/
2972idEntity *idGameLocal::SpawnEntityType( const idTypeInfo &classdef, const idDict *args, bool bIsClientReadSnapshot ) {
2973 idClass *obj;
2974
2975#if _DEBUG
2976 if ( isClient ) {
2977 assert( bIsClientReadSnapshot );
2978 }
2979#endif
2980
2981 if ( !classdef.IsType( idEntity::Type ) ) {
2982 Error( "Attempted to spawn non-entity class '%s'", classdef.classname );
2983 }
2984
2985 try {
2986 if ( args ) {
2987 spawnArgs = *args;
2988 } else {
2989 spawnArgs.Clear();
2990 }
2991 obj = classdef.CreateInstance();
2992 obj->CallSpawn();
2993 }
2994
2995 catch( idAllocError & ) {
2996 obj = NULL;
2997 }
2998 spawnArgs.Clear();
2999
3000 return static_cast<idEntity *>(obj);
3001}
3002
3003/*
3004===================
3005idGameLocal::SpawnEntityDef
3006
3007Finds the spawn function for the entity and calls it,
3008returning false if not found
3009===================
3010*/
3011bool idGameLocal::SpawnEntityDef( const idDict &args, idEntity **ent, bool setDefaults ) {
3012 const char *classname;
3013 const char *spawn;
3014 idTypeInfo *cls;
3015 idClass *obj;
3016 idStr error;
3017 const char *name;
3018
3019 if ( ent ) {
3020 *ent = NULL;
3021 }
3022
3023 spawnArgs = args;
3024
3025 if ( spawnArgs.GetString( "name", "", &name ) ) {
3026 sprintf( error, " on '%s'", name);
3027 }
3028
3029 spawnArgs.GetString( "classname", NULL, &classname );
3030
3031 const idDeclEntityDef *def = FindEntityDef( classname, false );
3032
3033 if ( !def ) {
3034 Warning( "Unknown classname '%s'%s.", classname, error.c_str() );
3035 return false;
3036 }
3037
3038 spawnArgs.SetDefaults( &def->dict );
3039
3040 // check if we should spawn a class object
3041 spawnArgs.GetString( "spawnclass", NULL, &spawn );
3042 if ( spawn ) {
3043
3044 cls = idClass::GetClass( spawn );
3045 if ( !cls ) {
3046 Warning( "Could not spawn '%s'. Class '%s' not found%s.", classname, spawn, error.c_str() );
3047 return false;
3048 }
3049
3050 obj = cls->CreateInstance();
3051 if ( !obj ) {
3052 Warning( "Could not spawn '%s'. Instance could not be created%s.", classname, error.c_str() );
3053 return false;
3054 }
3055
3056 obj->CallSpawn();
3057
3058 if ( ent && obj->IsType( idEntity::Type ) ) {
3059 *ent = static_cast<idEntity *>(obj);
3060 }
3061
3062 return true;
3063 }
3064
3065 // check if we should call a script function to spawn
3066 spawnArgs.GetString( "spawnfunc", NULL, &spawn );
3067 if ( spawn ) {
3068 const function_t *func = program.FindFunction( spawn );
3069 if ( !func ) {
3070 Warning( "Could not spawn '%s'. Script function '%s' not found%s.", classname, spawn, error.c_str() );
3071 return false;
3072 }
3073 idThread *thread = new idThread( func );
3074 thread->DelayedStart( 0 );
3075 return true;
3076 }
3077
3078 Warning( "%s doesn't include a spawnfunc or spawnclass%s.", classname, error.c_str() );
3079 return false;
3080}

3110idGameLocal::InhibitEntitySpawn
3111================
3112*/
3113bool idGameLocal::InhibitEntitySpawn( idDict &spawnArgs ) {
3114
3115 bool result = false;
3116
3117 if ( isMultiplayer ) {
3118 spawnArgs.GetBool( "not_multiplayer", "0", result );
3119 } else if ( g_skill.GetInteger() == 0 ) {
3120 spawnArgs.GetBool( "not_easy", "0", result );
3121 } else if ( g_skill.GetInteger() == 1 ) {
3122 spawnArgs.GetBool( "not_medium", "0", result );
3123 } else {
3124 spawnArgs.GetBool( "not_hard", "0", result );
3125 }
3126
3127 const char *name;
3128#ifndef ID_DEMO_BUILD
3129 if ( g_skill.GetInteger() == 3 ) {
3130 name = spawnArgs.GetString( "classname" );
3131 if ( idStr::Icmp( name, "item_medkit" ) == 0 || idStr::Icmp( name, "item_medkit_small" ) == 0 ) {
3132 result = true;
3133 }
3134 }
3135#endif
3136
3137 if ( gameLocal.isMultiplayer ) {
3138 name = spawnArgs.GetString( "classname" );
3139 if ( idStr::Icmp( name, "weapon_bfg" ) == 0 || idStr::Icmp( name, "weapon_soulcube" ) == 0 ) {
3140 result = true;
3141 }
3142 }
3143
3144 return result;
3145}

3193

3200

3204 }
3205
3206 // the worldspawn is a special that performs any global setup
3207 // needed by a level

3353/*
3354=============
3355idGameLocal::FindEntityUsingDef
3356
3357Searches all active entities for the next one using the specified entityDef.
3358
3359Searches beginning at the entity after from, or the beginning if NULL
3360NULL will be returned if the end of the list is reached.
3361=============
3362*/
3363idEntity *idGameLocal::FindEntityUsingDef( idEntity *from, const char *match ) const {
3364 idEntity *ent;
3365
3366 if ( !from ) {
3367 ent = spawnedEntities.Next();
3368 } else {
3369 ent = from->spawnNode.Next();
3370 }
3371
3372 for ( ; ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
3373 assert( ent );
3374 if ( idStr::Icmp( ent->GetEntityDefName(), match ) == 0 ) {
3375 return ent;
3376 }
3377 }
3378
3379 return NULL;

3382/*
3383=============
3384idGameLocal::FindTraceEntity
3385
3386Searches all active entities for the closest ( to start ) match that intersects
3387the line start,end
3388=============
3389*/
3390idEntity *idGameLocal::FindTraceEntity( idVec3 start, idVec3 end, const idTypeInfo &c, const idEntity *skip ) const {
3391 idEntity *ent;
3392 idEntity *bestEnt;
3393 float scale;
3394 float bestScale;
3395 idBounds b;
3396
3397 bestEnt = NULL;
3398 bestScale = 1.0f;
3399 for( ent = spawnedEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
3400 if ( ent->IsType( c ) && ent != skip ) {
3401 b = ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds().Expand( 16 );
3402 if ( b.RayIntersection( start, end-start, scale ) ) {
3403 if ( scale >= 0.0f && scale < bestScale ) {
3404 bestEnt = ent;
3405 bestScale = scale;
3406 }
3407 }
3408 }
3409 }
3410
3411 return bestEnt;
3412}

3419int idGameLocal::EntitiesWithinRadius( const idVec3 org, float radius, idEntity **entityList, int maxCount ) const {
