3434/*
3435=================
3436idGameLocal::KillBox
3437
3438Kills all entities that would touch the proposed new positioning of ent. The ent itself will not being killed.
3439Checks if player entities are in the teleporter, and marks them to die at teleport exit instead of immediately.
3440If catch_teleport, this only marks teleport players for death on exit
3441=================
3442*/
3443void idGameLocal::KillBox( idEntity *ent, bool catch_teleport ) {
3444 int i;
3445 int num;
3446 idEntity * hit;
3447 idClipModel *cm;
3448 idClipModel *clipModels[ MAX_GENTITIES ];
3449 idPhysics *phys;
3450
3451 phys = ent->GetPhysics();
3452 if ( !phys->GetNumClipModels() ) {
3453 return;
3454 }
3455
3456 num = clip.ClipModelsTouchingBounds( phys->GetAbsBounds(), phys->GetClipMask(), clipModels, MAX_GENTITIES );
3457 for ( i = 0; i < num; i++ ) {
3458 cm = clipModels[ i ];
3459
3460 // don't check render entities
3461 if ( cm->IsRenderModel() ) {
3462 continue;
3463 }
3464
3465 hit = cm->GetEntity();
3466 if ( ( hit == ent ) || !hit->fl.takedamage ) {
3467 continue;
3468 }
3469
3470 if ( !phys->ClipContents( cm ) ) {
3471 continue;
3472 }
3473
3474 // nail it
3475 if ( hit->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) && static_cast< idPlayer * >( hit )->IsInTeleport() ) {
3476 static_cast< idPlayer * >( hit )->TeleportDeath( ent->entityNumber );
3477 } else if ( !catch_teleport ) {
3478 hit->Damage( ent, ent, vec3_origin, "damage_telefrag", 1.0f, INVALID_JOINT );
3479 }
3480
3481 if ( !gameLocal.isMultiplayer ) {
3482 // let the mapper know about it
3483 Warning( "'%s' telefragged '%s'", ent->name.c_str(), hit->name.c_str() );
3484 }
3485 }
3486}

3494 if ( requires.Length() ) {
3495 if ( activator->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) ) {
3496 idPlayer *player = static_cast<idPlayer *>(activator);
3497 idDict *item = player->FindInventoryItem( requires );
3498 if ( item ) {
3499 if ( removeItem ) {
3500 player->RemoveInventoryItem( item );
3501 }
3502 return true;
3503 } else {
3504 return false;
3505 }
3506 }
3507 }
3508
3509 return true;
3510}

3538/*
3539============
3540idGameLocal::RadiusDamage
3541============
3542*/
3543void idGameLocal::RadiusDamage( const idVec3 &origin, idEntity *inflictor, idEntity *attacker, idEntity *ignoreDamage, idEntity *ignorePush, const char *damageDefName, float dmgPower ) {
3544 float dist, damageScale, attackerDamageScale, attackerPushScale;
3545 idEntity * ent;
3546 idEntity * entityList[ MAX_GENTITIES ];
3547 int numListedEntities;
3548 idBounds bounds;
3549 idVec3 v, damagePoint, dir;
3550 int i, e, damage, radius, push;
3551
3552 const idDict *damageDef = FindEntityDefDict( damageDefName, false );
3553 if ( !damageDef ) {
3554 Warning( "Unknown damageDef '%s'", damageDefName );
3555 return;
3556 }
3557
3558 damageDef->GetInt( "damage", "20", damage );
3559 damageDef->GetInt( "radius", "50", radius );
3560 damageDef->GetInt( "push", va( "%d", damage * 100 ), push );
3561 damageDef->GetFloat( "attackerDamageScale", "0.5", attackerDamageScale );
3562 damageDef->GetFloat( "attackerPushScale", "0", attackerPushScale );
3563
3564 if ( radius < 1 ) {
3565 radius = 1;
3566 }
3567
3568 bounds = idBounds( origin ).Expand( radius );
3569
3570 // get all entities touching the bounds
3571 numListedEntities = clip.EntitiesTouchingBounds( bounds, -1, entityList, MAX_GENTITIES );
3572
3573 if ( inflictor && inflictor->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) ) {
3574 inflictor = static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(inflictor)->GetBody();
3575 }
3576 if ( attacker && attacker->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) ) {
3577 attacker = static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(attacker)->GetBody();
3578 }
3579 if ( ignoreDamage && ignoreDamage->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) ) {
3580 ignoreDamage = static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(ignoreDamage)->GetBody();
3581 }
3582
3583 // apply damage to the entities
3584 for ( e = 0; e < numListedEntities; e++ ) {
3585 ent = entityList[ e ];
3586 assert( ent );
3587
3588 if ( !ent->fl.takedamage ) {
3589 continue;
3590 }
3591
3592 if ( ent == inflictor || ( ent->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) && static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(ent)->GetBody() == inflictor ) ) {
3593 continue;
3594 }
3595
3596 if ( ent == ignoreDamage || ( ent->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) && static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(ent)->GetBody() == ignoreDamage ) ) {
3597 continue;
3598 }
3599
3600 // don't damage a dead player
3601 if ( isMultiplayer && ent->entityNumber < MAX_CLIENTS && ent->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) && static_cast< idPlayer * >( ent )->health < 0 ) {
3602 continue;
3603 }
3604
3605 // find the distance from the edge of the bounding box
3606 for ( i = 0; i < 3; i++ ) {
3607 if ( origin[ i ] < ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds()[0][ i ] ) {
3608 v[ i ] = ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds()[0][ i ] - origin[ i ];
3609 } else if ( origin[ i ] > ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds()[1][ i ] ) {
3610 v[ i ] = origin[ i ] - ent->GetPhysics()->GetAbsBounds()[1][ i ];
3611 } else {
3612 v[ i ] = 0;
3613 }
3614 }
3615
3616 dist = v.Length();
3617 if ( dist >= radius ) {
3618 continue;
3619 }
3620
3621 if ( ent->CanDamage( origin, damagePoint ) ) {
3622 // push the center of mass higher than the origin so players
3623 // get knocked into the air more
3624 dir = ent->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() - origin;
3625 dir[ 2 ] += 24;
3626
3627 // get the damage scale
3628 damageScale = dmgPower * ( 1.0f - dist / radius );
3629 if ( ent == attacker || ( ent->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) && static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(ent)->GetBody() == attacker ) ) {
3630 damageScale *= attackerDamageScale;
3631 }
3632
3633 ent->Damage( inflictor, attacker, dir, damageDefName, damageScale, INVALID_JOINT );
3634 }
3635 }
3636
3637 // push physics objects
3638 if ( push ) {
3639 RadiusPush( origin, radius, push * dmgPower, attacker, ignorePush, attackerPushScale, false );
3640 }
3641}
3642
3643/*
3644==============
3645idGameLocal::RadiusPush
3646==============
3647*/
3648void idGameLocal::RadiusPush( const idVec3 &origin, const float radius, const float push, const idEntity *inflictor, const idEntity *ignore, float inflictorScale, const bool quake ) {
3649 int i, numListedClipModels;
3650 idClipModel *clipModel;
3651 idClipModel *clipModelList[ MAX_GENTITIES ];
3652 idVec3 dir;
3653 idBounds bounds;
3654 modelTrace_t result;
3655 idEntity *ent;
3656 float scale;
3657
3658 dir.Set( 0.0f, 0.0f, 1.0f );
3659
3660 bounds = idBounds( origin ).Expand( radius );
3661
3662 // get all clip models touching the bounds
3663 numListedClipModels = clip.ClipModelsTouchingBounds( bounds, -1, clipModelList, MAX_GENTITIES );
3664
3665 if ( inflictor && inflictor->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) ) {
3666 inflictor = static_cast<const idAFAttachment*>(inflictor)->GetBody();
3667 }
3668 if ( ignore && ignore->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) ) {
3669 ignore = static_cast<const idAFAttachment*>(ignore)->GetBody();
3670 }
3671
3672 // apply impact to all the clip models through their associated physics objects
3673 for ( i = 0; i < numListedClipModels; i++ ) {
3674
3675 clipModel = clipModelList[i];
3676
3677 // never push render models
3678 if ( clipModel->IsRenderModel() ) {
3679 continue;
3680 }
3681
3682 ent = clipModel->GetEntity();
3683
3684 // never push projectiles
3685 if ( ent->IsType( idProjectile::Type ) ) {
3686 continue;
3687 }
3688
3689 // players use "knockback" in idPlayer::Damage
3690 if ( ent->IsType( idPlayer::Type ) && !quake ) {
3691 continue;
3692 }
3693
3694 // don't push the ignore entity
3695 if ( ent == ignore || ( ent->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) && static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(ent)->GetBody() == ignore ) ) {
3696 continue;
3697 }
3698
3699 if ( gameRenderWorld->FastWorldTrace( result, origin, clipModel->GetOrigin() ) ) {
3700 continue;
3701 }
3702
3703 // scale the push for the inflictor
3704 if ( ent == inflictor || ( ent->IsType( idAFAttachment::Type ) && static_cast<idAFAttachment*>(ent)->GetBody() == inflictor ) ) {
3705 scale = inflictorScale;
3706 } else {
3707 scale = 1.0f;
3708 }
3709
3710 if ( quake ) {
3711 clipModel->GetEntity()->ApplyImpulse( world, clipModel->GetId(), clipModel->GetOrigin(), scale * push * dir );
3712 } else {
3713 RadiusPushClipModel( origin, scale * push, clipModel );
3714 }
3715 }
3716}
3717
3718/*
3719==============
3720idGameLocal::RadiusPushClipModel
3721==============
3722*/
3723void idGameLocal::RadiusPushClipModel( const idVec3 &origin, const float push, const idClipModel *clipModel ) {
3724 int i, j;
3725 float dot, dist, area;
3726 const idTraceModel *trm;
3727 const traceModelPoly_t *poly;
3728 idFixedWinding w;
3729 idVec3 v, localOrigin, center, impulse;
3730
3731 trm = clipModel->GetTraceModel();
3732 if ( !trm || 1 ) {
3733 impulse = clipModel->GetAbsBounds().GetCenter() - origin;
3734 impulse.Normalize();
3735 impulse.z += 1.0f;
3736 clipModel->GetEntity()->ApplyImpulse( world, clipModel->GetId(), clipModel->GetOrigin(), push * impulse );
3737 return;
3738 }
3739
3740 localOrigin = ( origin - clipModel->GetOrigin() ) * clipModel->GetAxis().Transpose();
3741 for ( i = 0; i < trm->numPolys; i++ ) {
3742 poly = &trm->polys[i];
3743
3744 center.Zero();
3745 for ( j = 0; j < poly->numEdges; j++ ) {
3746 v = trm->verts[ trm->edges[ abs(poly->edges[j]) ].v[ INTSIGNBITSET( poly->edges[j] ) ] ];
3747 center += v;
3748 v -= localOrigin;
3749 v.NormalizeFast(); // project point on a unit sphere
3750 w.AddPoint( v );
3751 }
3752 center /= poly->numEdges;
3753 v = center - localOrigin;
3754 dist = v.NormalizeFast();
3755 dot = v * poly->normal;
3756 if ( dot > 0.0f ) {
3757 continue;
3758 }
3759 area = w.GetArea();
3760 // impulse in polygon normal direction
3761 impulse = poly->normal * clipModel->GetAxis();
3762 // always push up for nicer effect
3763 impulse.z -= 1.0f;
3764 // scale impulse based on visible surface area and polygon angle
3765 impulse *= push * ( dot * area * ( 1.0f / ( 4.0f * idMath::PI ) ) );
3766 // scale away distance for nicer effect
3767 impulse *= ( dist * 2.0f );
3768 // impulse is applied to the center of the polygon
3769 center = clipModel->GetOrigin() + center * clipModel->GetAxis();
3770
3771 clipModel->GetEntity()->ApplyImpulse( world, clipModel->GetId(), center, impulse );
3772 }
3773}
3774
3775/*
3776===============
3777idGameLocal::ProjectDecal
3778===============
3779*/
3780void idGameLocal::ProjectDecal( const idVec3 &origin, const idVec3 &dir, float depth, bool parallel, float size, const char *material, float angle ) {
3781 float s, c;
3782 idMat3 axis, axistemp;
3783 idFixedWinding winding;
3784 idVec3 windingOrigin, projectionOrigin;
3785
3786 static idVec3 decalWinding[4] = {
3787 idVec3( 1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f ),
3788 idVec3( -1.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f ),
3789 idVec3( -1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f ),
3790 idVec3( 1.0f, -1.0f, 0.0f )
3791 };
3792
3793 if ( !g_decals.GetBool() ) {
3794 return;
3795 }
3796
3797 // randomly rotate the decal winding
3798 idMath::SinCos16( ( angle ) ? angle : random.RandomFloat() * idMath::TWO_PI, s, c );
3799
3800 // winding orientation
3801 axis[2] = dir;
3802 axis[2].Normalize();
3803 axis[2].NormalVectors( axistemp[0], axistemp[1] );
3804 axis[0] = axistemp[ 0 ] * c + axistemp[ 1 ] * -s;
3805 axis[1] = axistemp[ 0 ] * -s + axistemp[ 1 ] * -c;
3806
3807 windingOrigin = origin + depth * axis[2];
3808 if ( parallel ) {
3809 projectionOrigin = origin - depth * axis[2];
3810 } else {
3811 projectionOrigin = origin;
3812 }
3813
3814 size *= 0.5f;
3815
3816 winding.Clear();
3817 winding += idVec5( windingOrigin + ( axis * decalWinding[0] ) * size, idVec2( 1, 1 ) );
3818 winding += idVec5( windingOrigin + ( axis * decalWinding[1] ) * size, idVec2( 0, 1 ) );
3819 winding += idVec5( windingOrigin + ( axis * decalWinding[2] ) * size, idVec2( 0, 0 ) );
3820 winding += idVec5( windingOrigin + ( axis * decalWinding[3] ) * size, idVec2( 1, 0 ) );
3821 gameRenderWorld->ProjectDecalOntoWorld( winding, projectionOrigin, parallel, depth * 0.5f, declManager->FindMaterial( material ), time );
3822}
3823
3824/*
3825==============
3826idGameLocal::BloodSplat
3827==============
3828*/
3829void idGameLocal::BloodSplat( const idVec3 &origin, const idVec3 &dir, float size, const char *material ) {
3830 float halfSize = size * 0.5f;
3831 idVec3 verts[] = { idVec3( 0.0f, +halfSize, +halfSize ),
3832 idVec3( 0.0f, +halfSize, -halfSize ),
3833 idVec3( 0.0f, -halfSize, -halfSize ),
3834 idVec3( 0.0f, -halfSize, +halfSize ) };
3835 idTraceModel trm;
3836 idClipModel mdl;
3837 trace_t results;
3838
3839 // FIXME: get from damage def
3840 if ( !g_bloodEffects.GetBool() ) {
3841 return;
3842 }
3843
3844 size = halfSize + random.RandomFloat() * halfSize;
3845 trm.SetupPolygon( verts, 4 );
3846 mdl.LoadModel( trm );
3847 clip.Translation( results, origin, origin + dir * 64.0f, &mdl, mat3_identity, CONTENTS_SOLID, NULL );
3848 ProjectDecal( results.endpos, dir, 2.0f * size, true, size, material );
3849}
3850
3851/*
3852=============
3853idGameLocal::SetCamera
3854=============
3855*/
3856void idGameLocal::SetCamera( idCamera *cam ) {
3857 int i;
3858 idEntity *ent;
3859 idAI *ai;
3860
3861 // this should fix going into a cinematic when dead.. rare but happens
3862 idPlayer *client = GetLocalPlayer();
3863 if ( client->health <= 0 || client->AI_DEAD ) {
3864 return;
3865 }
3866
3867 camera = cam;
3868 if ( camera ) {
3869 inCinematic = true;
3870
3871 if ( skipCinematic && camera->spawnArgs.GetBool( "disconnect" ) ) {
3872 camera->spawnArgs.SetBool( "disconnect", false );
3873 cvarSystem->SetCVarFloat( "r_znear", 3.0f );
3874 cmdSystem->BufferCommandText( CMD_EXEC_APPEND, "disconnect\n" );
3875 skipCinematic = false;
3876 return;
3877 }
3878
3879 if ( time > cinematicStopTime ) {
3880 cinematicSkipTime = time + CINEMATIC_SKIP_DELAY;
3881 }
3882
3883 // set r_znear so that transitioning into/out of the player's head doesn't clip through the view
3884 cvarSystem->SetCVarFloat( "r_znear", 1.0f );
3885
3886 // hide all the player models
3887 for( i = 0; i < numClients; i++ ) {
3888 if ( entities[ i ] ) {
3889 client = static_cast< idPlayer* >( entities[ i ] );
3890 client->EnterCinematic();
3891 }
3892 }
3893
3894 if ( !cam->spawnArgs.GetBool( "ignore_enemies" ) ) {
3895 // kill any active monsters that are enemies of the player
3896 for ( ent = spawnedEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
3897 if ( ent->cinematic || ent->fl.isDormant ) {
3898 // only kill entities that aren't needed for cinematics and aren't dormant
3899 continue;
3900 }
3901
3902 if ( ent->IsType( idAI::Type ) ) {
3903 ai = static_cast<idAI *>( ent );
3904 if ( !ai->GetEnemy() || !ai->IsActive() ) {
3905 // no enemy, or inactive, so probably safe to ignore
3906 continue;
3907 }
3908 } else if ( ent->IsType( idProjectile::Type ) ) {
3909 // remove all projectiles
3910 } else if ( ent->spawnArgs.GetBool( "cinematic_remove" ) ) {
3911 // remove anything marked to be removed during cinematics
3912 } else {
3913 // ignore everything else
3914 continue;
3915 }
3916
3917 // remove it
3918 DPrintf( "removing '%s' for cinematic\n", ent->GetName() );
3919 ent->PostEventMS( &EV_Remove, 0 );
3920 }
3921 }
3922
3923 } else {
3924 inCinematic = false;
3925 cinematicStopTime = time + msec;
3926
3927 // restore r_znear
3928 cvarSystem->SetCVarFloat( "r_znear", 3.0f );
3929
3930 // show all the player models
3931 for( i = 0; i < numClients; i++ ) {
3932 if ( entities[ i ] ) {
3933 idPlayer *client = static_cast< idPlayer* >( entities[ i ] );
3934 client->ExitCinematic();
3935 }
3936 }
3937 }
3938}

3949/*
3950=============
3951idGameLocal::SkipCinematic
3952=============
3953*/
3954bool idGameLocal::SkipCinematic( void ) {
3955 if ( camera ) {
3956 if ( camera->spawnArgs.GetBool( "disconnect" ) ) {
3957 camera->spawnArgs.SetBool( "disconnect", false );
3958 cvarSystem->SetCVarFloat( "r_znear", 3.0f );
3959 cmdSystem->BufferCommandText( CMD_EXEC_APPEND, "disconnect\n" );
3960 skipCinematic = false;
3961 return false;
3962 }
3963
3964 if ( camera->spawnArgs.GetBool( "instantSkip" ) ) {
3965 camera->Stop();
3966 return false;
3967 }
3968 }
3969
3970 soundSystem->SetMute( true );
3971 if ( !skipCinematic ) {
3972 skipCinematic = true;
3973 cinematicMaxSkipTime = gameLocal.time + SEC2MS( g_cinematicMaxSkipTime.GetFloat() );
3974 }
3975
3976 return true;
3977}

3980/*
3981======================
3982idGameLocal::SpreadLocations
3983
3984Now that everything has been spawned, associate areas with location entities
3985======================
3986*/
3987void idGameLocal::SpreadLocations() {
3988 idEntity *ent;
3989
3990 // allocate the area table
3991 int numAreas = gameRenderWorld->NumAreas();
3992 locationEntities = new idLocationEntity *[ numAreas ];
3993 memset( locationEntities, 0, numAreas * sizeof( *locationEntities ) );
3994
3995 // for each location entity, make pointers from every area it touches
3996 for( ent = spawnedEntities.Next(); ent != NULL; ent = ent->spawnNode.Next() ) {
3997 if ( !ent->IsType( idLocationEntity::Type ) ) {
3998 continue;
3999 }
4000 idVec3 point = ent->spawnArgs.GetVector( "origin" );
4001 int areaNum = gameRenderWorld->PointInArea( point );
4002 if ( areaNum < 0 ) {
4003 Printf( "SpreadLocations: location '%s' is not in a valid area\n", ent->spawnArgs.GetString( "name" ) );
4004 continue;
4005 }
4006 if ( areaNum >= numAreas ) {
4007 Error( "idGameLocal::SpreadLocations: areaNum >= gameRenderWorld->NumAreas()" );
4008 }
4009 if ( locationEntities[areaNum] ) {
4010 Warning( "location entity '%s' overlaps '%s'", ent->spawnArgs.GetString( "name" ),
4011 locationEntities[areaNum]->spawnArgs.GetString( "name" ) );
4012 continue;
4013 }
4014 locationEntities[areaNum] = static_cast<idLocationEntity *>(ent);
4015
4016 // spread to all other connected areas
4017 for ( int i = 0 ; i < numAreas ; i++ ) {
4018 if ( i == areaNum ) {
4019 continue;
4020 }
4021 if ( gameRenderWorld->AreasAreConnected( areaNum, i, PS_BLOCK_LOCATION ) ) {
4022 locationEntities[i] = static_cast<idLocationEntity *>(ent);
4023 }
4024 }
4025 }
4026}
4027
4028/*
4029===================
4030idGameLocal::LocationForPoint
4031
4032The player checks the location each frame to update the HUD text display
4033May return NULL
4034===================
4035*/
4036idLocationEntity *idGameLocal::LocationForPoint( const idVec3 &point ) {
4037 if ( !locationEntities ) {
4038 // before SpreadLocations() has been called
4039 return NULL;
4040 }
4041
4042 int areaNum = gameRenderWorld->PointInArea( point );
4043 if ( areaNum < 0 ) {
4044 return NULL;
4045 }
4046 if ( areaNum >= gameRenderWorld->NumAreas() ) {
4047 Error( "idGameLocal::LocationForPoint: areaNum >= gameRenderWorld->NumAreas()" );
4048 }
4049
4050 return locationEntities[ areaNum ];
4051}

4055idGameLocal::SetPortalState

4058void idGameLocal::SetPortalState( qhandle_t portal, int blockingBits ) {
4059 idBitMsg outMsg;
4060 byte msgBuf[ MAX_GAME_MESSAGE_SIZE ];
4061
4062 if ( !gameLocal.isClient ) {
4063 outMsg.Init( msgBuf, sizeof( msgBuf ) );
4064 outMsg.WriteByte( GAME_RELIABLE_MESSAGE_PORTAL );
4065 outMsg.WriteLong( portal );
4066 outMsg.WriteBits( blockingBits, NUM_RENDER_PORTAL_BITS );
4067 networkSystem->ServerSendReliableMessage( -1, outMsg );
4068 }
4069 gameRenderWorld->SetPortalState( portal, blockingBits );

4072/*
4073============
4074idGameLocal::sortSpawnPoints
4075============
4076*/
4077int idGameLocal::sortSpawnPoints( const void *ptr1, const void *ptr2 ) {
4078 const spawnSpot_t *spot1 = static_cast<const spawnSpot_t *>( ptr1 );
4079 const spawnSpot_t *spot2 = static_cast<const spawnSpot_t *>( ptr2 );
4080 float diff;
4081
4082 diff = spot1->dist - spot2->dist;
4083 if ( diff < 0.0f ) {
4084 return 1;
4085 } else if ( diff > 0.0f ) {
4086 return -1;
4087 } else {
4088 return 0;
4089 }
4090}

4092/*
4093===========
4094idGameLocal::RandomizeInitialSpawns
4095randomize the order of the initial spawns
4096prepare for a sequence of initial player spawns
4097============
4098*/
4099void idGameLocal::RandomizeInitialSpawns( void ) {
4100 spawnSpot_t spot;
4101 int i, j;
4102 idEntity *ent;
4103
4104 if ( !isMultiplayer || isClient ) {
4105 return;
4106 }
4107 spawnSpots.Clear();
4108 initialSpots.Clear();
4109 spot.dist = 0;
4110 spot.ent = FindEntityUsingDef( NULL, "info_player_deathmatch" );
4111 while( spot.ent ) {
4112 spawnSpots.Append( spot );
4113 if ( spot.ent->spawnArgs.GetBool( "initial" ) ) {
4114 initialSpots.Append( spot.ent );
4115 }
4116 spot.ent = FindEntityUsingDef( spot.ent, "info_player_deathmatch" );
4117 }
4118 if ( !spawnSpots.Num() ) {
4119 common->Warning( "no info_player_deathmatch in map" );
4120 return;
4121 }
4122 common->Printf( "%d spawns (%d initials)\n", spawnSpots.Num(), initialSpots.Num() );
4123 // if there are no initial spots in the map, consider they can all be used as initial
4124 if ( !initialSpots.Num() ) {
4125 common->Warning( "no info_player_deathmatch entities marked initial in map" );
4126 for ( i = 0; i < spawnSpots.Num(); i++ ) {
4127 initialSpots.Append( spawnSpots[ i ].ent );
4128 }
4129 }
4130 for ( i = 0; i < initialSpots.Num(); i++ ) {
4131 j = random.RandomInt( initialSpots.Num() );
4132 ent = initialSpots[ i ];
4133 initialSpots[ i ] = initialSpots[ j ];
4134 initialSpots[ j ] = ent;
4135 }
4136 // reset the counter
4137 currentInitialSpot = 0;
4138}
4139
4140/*
4141===========
4142idGameLocal::SelectInitialSpawnPoint
4143spectators are spawned randomly anywhere
4144in-game clients are spawned based on distance to active players (randomized on the first half)
4145upon map restart, initial spawns are used (randomized ordered list of spawns flagged "initial")
4146 if there are more players than initial spots, overflow to regular spawning
4147============
4148*/
4149idEntity *idGameLocal::SelectInitialSpawnPoint( idPlayer *player ) {
4150 int i, j, which;
4151 spawnSpot_t spot;
4152 idVec3 pos;
4153 float dist;
4154 bool alone;
4155
4156 if ( !isMultiplayer || !spawnSpots.Num() ) {
4157 spot.ent = FindEntityUsingDef( NULL, "info_player_start" );
4158 if ( !spot.ent ) {
4159 Error( "No info_player_start on map.\n" );
4160 }
4161 return spot.ent;
4162 }
4163 if ( player->spectating ) {
4164 // plain random spot, don't bother
4165 return spawnSpots[ random.RandomInt( spawnSpots.Num() ) ].ent;
4166 } else if ( player->useInitialSpawns && currentInitialSpot < initialSpots.Num() ) {
4167 return initialSpots[ currentInitialSpot++ ];
4168 } else {
4169 // check if we are alone in map
4170 alone = true;
4171 for ( j = 0; j < MAX_CLIENTS; j++ ) {
4172 if ( entities[ j ] && entities[ j ] != player ) {
4173 alone = false;
4174 break;
4175 }
4176 }
4177 if ( alone ) {
4178 // don't do distance-based
4179 return spawnSpots[ random.RandomInt( spawnSpots.Num() ) ].ent;
4180 }
4181
4182 // find the distance to the closest active player for each spawn spot
4183 for( i = 0; i < spawnSpots.Num(); i++ ) {
4184 pos = spawnSpots[ i ].ent->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin();
4185 spawnSpots[ i ].dist = 0x7fffffff;
4186 for( j = 0; j < MAX_CLIENTS; j++ ) {
4187 if ( !entities[ j ] || !entities[ j ]->IsType( idPlayer::Type )
4188 || entities[ j ] == player
4189 || static_cast< idPlayer * >( entities[ j ] )->spectating ) {
4190 continue;
4191 }
4192
4193 dist = ( pos - entities[ j ]->GetPhysics()->GetOrigin() ).LengthSqr();
4194 if ( dist < spawnSpots[ i ].dist ) {
4195 spawnSpots[ i ].dist = dist;
4196 }
4197 }
4198 }
4199
4200 // sort the list
4201 qsort( ( void * )spawnSpots.Ptr(), spawnSpots.Num(), sizeof( spawnSpot_t ), ( int (*)(const void *, const void *) )sortSpawnPoints );
4202
4203 // choose a random one in the top half
4204 which = random.RandomInt( spawnSpots.Num() / 2 );
4205 spot = spawnSpots[ which ];
4206 }
4207 return spot.ent;
4208}

4210/*
4211================
4212idGameLocal::UpdateServerInfoFlags
4213================
4214*/
4215void idGameLocal::UpdateServerInfoFlags() {
4216 gameType = GAME_SP;
4217 if ( ( idStr::Icmp( serverInfo.GetString( "si_gameType" ), "deathmatch" ) == 0 ) ) {
4218 gameType = GAME_DM;
4219 } else if ( ( idStr::Icmp( serverInfo.GetString( "si_gameType" ), "Tourney" ) == 0 ) ) {
4220 gameType = GAME_TOURNEY;
4221 } else if ( ( idStr::Icmp( serverInfo.GetString( "si_gameType" ), "Team DM" ) == 0 ) ) {
4222 gameType = GAME_TDM;
4223 } else if ( ( idStr::Icmp( serverInfo.GetString( "si_gameType" ), "Last Man" ) == 0 ) ) {
4224 gameType = GAME_LASTMAN;
4225 }
4226 if ( gameType == GAME_LASTMAN ) {
4227 if ( !serverInfo.GetInt( "si_warmup" ) ) {
4228 common->Warning( "Last Man Standing - forcing warmup on" );
4229 serverInfo.SetInt( "si_warmup", 1 );
4230 }
4231 if ( serverInfo.GetInt( "si_fraglimit" ) <= 0 ) {
4232 common->Warning( "Last Man Standing - setting fraglimit 1" );
4233 serverInfo.SetInt( "si_fraglimit", 1 );
4234 }
4235 }
4236}

4301/*
4302===========
4303idGameLocal::NeedRestart
4304============
4305*/
4306bool idGameLocal::NeedRestart() {
4307
4308 idDict newInfo;
4309 const idKeyValue *keyval, *keyval2;
4310
4311 newInfo = *cvarSystem->MoveCVarsToDict( CVAR_SERVERINFO );
4312
4313 for ( int i = 0; i < newInfo.GetNumKeyVals(); i++ ) {
4314 keyval = newInfo.GetKeyVal( i );
4315 keyval2 = serverInfo.FindKey( keyval->GetKey() );
4316 if ( !keyval2 ) {
4317 return true;
4318 }
4319 // a select set of si_ changes will cause a full restart of the server
4320 if ( keyval->GetValue().Cmp( keyval2->GetValue() ) && ( !keyval->GetKey().Cmp( "si_pure" ) || !keyval->GetKey().Cmp( "si_map" ) ) ) {
4321 return true;
4322 }
4323 }
4324 return false;
4325}

4337/*
4338================
4339idGameLocal::SwitchTeam
4340================
4341*/
4342void idGameLocal::SwitchTeam( int clientNum, int team ) {
4343
4344 idPlayer * player;
4345 player = clientNum >= 0 ? static_cast<idPlayer *>( gameLocal.entities[ clientNum ] ) : NULL;
4346
4347 if ( !player )
4348 return;
4349
4350 int oldTeam = player->team;
4351
4352 // Put in spectator mode
4353 if ( team == -1 ) {
4354 static_cast< idPlayer * >( entities[ clientNum ] )->Spectate( true );
4355 }
4356 // Switch to a team
4357 else {
4358 mpGame.SwitchToTeam ( clientNum, oldTeam, team );
4359 }
4360}
